reviews.review: Great warm hospitality!. I definitely would recommend this place for anyone wishes to have nice & relaxing massage & spa in Hanoi. Located in the heart of Hanoi, not hard to find. Also they provide 1 way free taxi to Spa. Ms. Snow has done everything including even my girlfriend's birthday cake! She takes in charge of all customers personally and assure their service to be top notch. I have enjoyed hot stone massage and my girlfriend has enjoyed hot stone massage, facial massage, foot massage, and complimentary cakes and drinks! I will be coming back for more next time. Wonderful place to be!

Relaxing foot massages. Have been in Hanoi for five days and this spa was just steps away from my hotel. Called in without an appointment yet nothing was too much trouble for the staff. I decided on a 45min foot massage after travelling 24hrs and then walking around seeing the sights I felt my feet needed a treat.And that it was. Simply excellent. So much so I have had one every day after trekking the sights. Each time I arrived without an appointment and each time the lovely reception lady remembered me and what massage I'd like. All the staff excellent every time. In fact I woke myself with my own snoring they had relaxed me so much. Sadly as I write I leave tomorrow evening but will try and squeeze in another before I go.Thanks again to you all at La Belle.
Most enjoyable . We enjoyed a foot massage & pedicure by very friendly staff who speak excellent English. The spa has an awesome rooftop bar with city views too, which was great after our treatment!
Relaxing foot massage. The staff were very friendly. Foot massage was top notch. Also cool roof top bar to get a drink afterwards.

A lovely few hours spent being pampered. A beautiful spa with amazing staff . We were greeted with a welcome drink and made to feel very comfortable. My boyfriend wanted a massage and I wanted a manicure and pedicure. The therapist Theresa was so good , she organised our treatment time so that we would be finished at the same time . Really good attention to detail and 100% brilliant customer service . Theresa even organised for some cocunut oil to be delivered to my hotel the same afternoon as I loved the one she used during the treatment so much . Not to pricey and definitely more proffesional than a lot of the massage places you see on the street .

Hallelujah Labella!. We went to heaven upon arriving at Labella, the timing was perfect, having walked for hours through the night markets, our tired aching feet were treated to the soft intuitive hands of our proffessional masseuse'. I chose strong, he chose medium, it was amazing. I floated in joy for over an hour, knowing that my feet would happily carry me through the rest of our trip due to the gorgeous treatment they had received! Absolutely beautiful people there to take your pains away. Do it for yourself...and bliss out ♡♡♡

Highly Recommended - Wonderful . Fresh and Clean...great location...on the edge of the "Old Quarter" and near beautiful Hoang Kiem Lake. Ask for "Anh" for your spa treatment. If not available...all are VERY good. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! ...ALSO GOOD ENGLISH
Holiday. Very nice SPA, and so friendly staff. Thx Mr. Frank or Mr. Anh for ur hospitality and guide us to find thia SPA

Great find, great staff, great service. Had a lovely experience today. Excellent Thai massage, one of the best I've had for a long time. The staff were so friendly I went back later for a pedicure. Thanks Snow, Ha, Hoy and Rose. You were awesome

Best massage in Vietnam! Must visit! . Visited earlier today for a Thai massage, amazing service! Complimentary drinks on arrival free of charge. Very welcoming and all round a great experience! Will definitely be returning!

Very professional!. I was in Hanoi on a business trip and decided to look into getting a massage. I was extremely satisfied with my experience at La Belle. When I called ahead, the receptionist was extremely courteous and was able to quickly schedule a time for me. I received the head and neck massage, which was very effective in relieving some upper back soreness I was experiencing. Afterwards, I enjoyed a cold coke and dinner in the upstairs city view restaurant and bar. Overall, I was extremely satisfied and would highly recommend this location to others.
Amazing foot massage. My fiancé and I went for a one hour foot massage here. Man was it blissss!! The girls were amazing, the service was fantastic. Would highly recommend.
Very good service. We really enjoyed our back massages at this spa! It was very clean and the masseuses were highly professional and very friendly!
A very relaxing experience. I'm very much satisfied with my treatment I had today. Lovely and very professional staff. Highly recommended!
Good back massage. Clean spa with very friendly staff. Spa has a nice little rooftop bar where you can have a drink after your treatment.

Friendly staff. We came here for a leg and back massage as we were walking around in Hanoi a lot. It is a very clean and friendly place. They also, have a cozy roof top bar for customers only where you can grab a drink after your massage.

ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC!!. I've been travelling around Southeast Asia for over a month now and had numerous massage experiences in Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. I can honestly say La Belle Spa is by far the best one I have come across. No one was outside heckling us on the street trying to force us in and when we went inside we were greeted by a very courteous young gentleman who offered us fresh cold water and a comfortable seat to peruse the menu. We decided to get the relaxation package which we paid buttons for when you think about what you get compared with western prices. We were shown to our own comfortable private room via lift, which was nice considering how much walking we'd done around Hanoi! The room was well equipped for a spa and much more elegant than most others I'd been to - real massage tables, clean towels, relaxing music and lighting, etc. The staff were very professional and polite, offered us silk pyjamas to change into and explained to us the process (as the relaxation package has many treatments!) The room was air conditioned and everything was just so wonderful that I actually drifted off to sleep! The girls did not talk or use their mobile phones at all during the treatments (things I've witnessed many times in other spas) and were very respectful of my privacy when I was getting on and off the bed/getting changed. The treatments ran a little longer than expected which I'm not complaining about! :) We were offered free drinks in the bar upstairs overlooking the city following our treatments, including beer! (Much more than other places that just offer tea in a little room). All in all it was a fabulous experience and the manager - who can speak fantastic English - is such a wonderful woman and ensured we had the best spa experience.I'll be going back!! Thank you La Belle Spa - I feel like a new woman!

Exquisite service from start to finish. . After hiking mount fansipan in Sapa me and my friend decided to treat ourselves to a full spa day. We spent a little time browsing the many choices of spas in Hanoi given that we are on a budget but at the same time felt we'd earned a treat.We got the full works with steam bath, body scrub, full body massage and facial. The manager was very friendly and welcoming and offered extra time/focus on our feet given how much walking around we'd done. During 2 months backpacking Indochina, and numerous spa visits this was the first place we'd been to that gave us a short questionnaire asking where we would like focus and what kind/style/pressure of massage we preferred. Staff took the information into account and personalised each of our experiences. There was no points in which I caught or sensed the masseuse on her phone which seems to be a regular occurrence out here.They overran with time a little which was nice given other places I've been to that feel a little rushed towards the end of time. La Belle Spa took their time to finish properly and ensure we were fully happy and relaxed. All in all very professional service and incredibly friendly staff. Would highly recommend this spa. You will not get better for your money in Hanoi.

Great massage and great people . We found this massage center after a long trio and we have had a great experience. The staff is very kind, nice place, very clean and the therapysts are really professional. We are very used to have massages in our contry and this spa is even better. I strongly recommend it. It has also a terrace bar were you can relax having a beer after your massage.

Great spa for massage only. Very good massage place. I had a shoulder, neck and head massage for 45 min, which I highly recommend. A bit overpriced for Vietnam though (300 vnd). Only bad thing: the therapist did not speak English, which was a bit annoying when I asked for less pressure. Otherwise the staff is really nice.However my friend had a manicure, which turned to be terrible because of bad nail polishing (although the nail polish was OPI).

Awesome place to relax. Awesome little place to stop in for a great massage! The staff were great and very professional and the service was excellent. I'm a big guy and I asked for a strong massage and that's what I got. After your massage definitely have a drink at the bar upstairs they have cold drinks and a great view of the streets.
Massage to Sapa. Very good company and very beautiful hôtel. The spa was perfect et the staff very careful. I recommanded this place!

Great massage for the weary body. I walked 30 kilometres around Hanoi today and came here for probably the most relaxing massage by Yen. It was an experience I have not had in a long time. Highly recommended as they have the most courteous and delighful staff

Good service, nice atmosphere and friendly staff. We went to la belle spa and had a pedicure and a massage.
Staff is really friendly and the service is in top. The atmosphere is cosy and the rooftop bar was a nice place to spend some time.
Sofie from Denmark

Brilliant spa with very lovely staff. Very clean. We stumbled across this very reasonably priced spa and decided to get a one hour foot massage, scrub and mask all for £12! Not only were the surroundings very clean and welcoming but the staff were exceptional; from the brilliant masseuses to the receptionist and the lovely Anh who served us a free soft drink each on their little rooftop bar after our foot treatment had finished. Would highly recommended! The staff were not only professional but some of the friendliest Vietnamese people we have met!

Attentive service, professional therapists. La Belle Spa is welcoming and attentive. Our therapists were well trained and considerate and the spa is clean and well maintained. We did not book ahead and therapists were available without waiting. From our therapy room we could hear a background hum of traffic and noise from the street below though this did not detract from the enjoyment of our massages.

Great massage!. I visited three times and had a different masseuse each time, all three were fantastic. Legitimate operation with a nice little roof top bar to enjoy a drink before or after a relaxing massage.

BEST MASSAGE EVER!!. Came across La Belle when we were walking in the old quarter of Hanoi.. We were greeted by ms snow in the reception. She is so sweet and really makes you feel welcome as soon as you step in the door.. La Belle really gives the best massages in Hanoi, and the staff is amazing and very friendly.. I am definitely coming back.. :D

Great foot massage from snow white. Sorted out my painful feet and lower legs! Really a good place where they know and care about what they are doing. I recommend snow white cause she's who i had and it was up there with best foot massage.

One of the best massages I've had. After working in a kindergaten here in Hanoi for two mounths I was in desperat need of a good massage. I had already had some pretty bad experiences with spas here in Hanoi, but as far as La Belle Spa goes I have nothing bad to say. We Where welcommed by lovely englishspeaking Miss Snow, who took exellent care of us (she even made me ginger/honey tea when she found out I was a little sick!). Them we went to get our treatments and everything was so professional. All the people working there really knew what the were doing and I will never look for another place in the next four Mounths I am here! The price is more than fair for a relaxing, competent and in every way wonderful experience! I payed 420.000 VND wich is around 19 USD.If you are looking for a great massage here in Hanoi - you found it!

Unannounced but well catered for. I didn't have a reservation. I just turned up around 17:30 on the day I arrived in Hanoi. Even though the lady didn't speak that much English, she got the gist of what I wanted. I went for the 90 min Swedish massage. I went to a room where there was three massage beds but there was no other customers there, so it was very quiet. The room was well air conditioned with a minimal background noise from the traffic.Minor note - the services offered in the website is different from what is actually offered.

Special service with friendly staff. Thank you Ms. Snow receptionistWe got best recomment for spa treatment from Ms. Snow. We chossed aroma massage for 1 hour with private room. The therapist just lovely style massage. They give us sleep well for relaxing! Thanks for all. We will back here soon for sure

Average massage at above average prices. I think getting a massage in Hanoi is surprisingly pricey, especially compared with nearby countries like Thailand. Nevertheless, I really needed a foot massage so I decided to check this place out, given the good reviews I had read online.Something done different here was that instead of sitting in a chair to have my foot massage, I was brought to one of the massage beds instead and asked to lie down.The massage was gentle and the masseuse did press every spot on the foot, but it felt rather mechanical as if she was just going through the motions. I felt relaxed, but no more than just sitting in one of those massage chairs and getting a foot massage.

Best massage in Hanoi - with a complimentary beer to boot!. We stumbled upon this place by chance, walking around Hanoi's old quarter. I went for the traditional Thai massage and the deep tissue massage on two different occasions, both of which were superb. The deep tissue was particularly good for back pain - it completely disappeared after a one hour massage. The staff are exceptionally friendly and accommodating. The place even has a rooftop bar where you can enjoy a complimentary cold beer once your aches and pains have been relieved!
Nice place and best massage. I enjoyed the signature massage. The therapist was great and giving the same pressures for the whole body. Great ambiance and design. Will definitely recommend this.

Relax and unwind.. This place is where to go to relieve all your daily stresses and at affordable prices.The foot and body massages offered are carried out by professional staff and out of all the massages i have taken, this was by far the best.Located in the hub of Hanoi, La Belle Spa is easily found and i totally recommend a visit.

One of the best massage I've ever had. La Belle Spa is location in the old quarter, close where i was staying. I had two treatments here, the relaxation 90 mins massage and a hot stone foot massage for 60 mins. Both treatments were excellent. The massage was carried out very professionally and the masseuses were very polite and friendly. Everything from the greeting, complimentary tea, ambience and service was exceptional. The price was reasonable, so comfortable and relaxing. Thank you the lady ( Miss. Duy ) did my massage was a real good professional, know her job. Left feeling relaxed and refreshed. Highly recommend.

Fantastic Massage. Wonderful 1 hour Thai massage. Clean & quiet location, staff speak great English & experienced in all formats of massage. A really relaxing time after a long weekend of partying. Will come back again. Thank you.

Family visit. 5 of us kids 7 10 12 had a great foot and back massage in a private room. The two little kids shared a bed. Then a beer and soft drink on the roof top for free. He said we could have another but we wanted to go to the market. They invited us in from the street and gave us 10% discount. It was 800000 and we tipped 200000. The massage we asked for was foot but my wife and I got the back as an extra. Maybe because it was later after dinner. 12.50 each wow. Winner winner chicken dinner.

Great massage, nice staff. We choosed aroma massage 60 minute after long trip from sapa. The therapist speack english well, we went sleep in 1 hour massage, the room was very clean and i like oil smell so much. Great for relaxing. Hight recomment!

Great experience. I went with a friends and we both got a massage and went in the steam bath. The massage was great. The masseuses often asked if the pressure was good enough. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. We got a free drink at the rooftop bar afterwards. I will definitely come back when I can and recommend it to anyone

Great massage, reasonable prices. Our appointments at another spa got double booked so my friend and I wandered down the street looking for another place since we both had knots in our backs from travel. My friend had been here before and they were able to take us in right away. Snow and her husband were very lovely. We were given a lovely welcome drink while we waited a couple minutes for the masseuses to prepare the treatment room. We were trying to meet up with friends afterwards so we only had a 45 minute back massage but it was SO good. Completely alleviated my aches and pains, both of the women working on us were very good at their jobs. Afterwards Snow brought us up to a rooftop cafe and offered us a beverage. We left completely relaxed.

Very Thai wonderful massage and professional. Excellent and respected massage was the reception and hospitality wonderful from manager Snow. and relaxing in the roof with the green tea and fruits Was a time not forget the pleasure of the visit and will repeat it again.

One of the best massages I had while I was there.. We were drop in just walking around, Hanoi. The lady who greeted us was very nice and welcoming. She took our orders for a lack of a better word. Like our first massage in Vietnam we were all put in one room. We changed into more appropriate clothing for massages. We decided on the 90 minute deep tissue the massage. The massage therapist were far more professional than some we had experienced before and after. We felt very comfortable and relaxed, they made sure during the massage that the pressure was good. The price was very reasonable for what they offered. Also, to top it off we were escorted to the roof for free drinks on their roof top bar. It was a nice relaxing evening that we enjoyed.

Best Massage ever. Book in early if you can as it can be quiet busy, however walk in's ok. I little more costly than some but worth every cent. About 400,000 dong for an hour. Free fresh juice if you have to wait. Service was very professional and clean.
best massage all time. the afternoons are busy, best to book ahead. got the deep tissue massage, very clean and relaxing environment, staff very professional, a little more expensive but worth it
Relaxing foot massge. Had a 1 hour foot massage and it was so relaxing. The service was great and we received a free fresh pineapple juice after. Would recommend to go here
Amazing hot stone massage with a free beer on the rooftop at the end. Really welcoming staff and talented masseuses. Would highly recommend to anyone. The free beer after was a bonus.
The best mani and pedi. Thank you to Snow for her excellent service. She gave me an amazing manicure and pedicure and really made sure it was perfect. I would highly recommend this spa

Quality Massage. Went to a few massage places in Hanoi, and this one was my favorite. Great location and excellent decor. The people were nice, friendly and accommodating. They went out of their way to make my time there great. Truth be told - I only got a foot massage, but it was an excellent foot massage. They even ended up working my back and shoulders, too. All for an affordable price. This place is worth checking out if you're in Hanoi.

Best hot stone massage. I had a hot stone massage at la belle spa. It was perfect! I really enjoyed it. The people there are very friendly and helpful.
Thank you very much!
Great service . Great value and service. My chosen massage 'deep tissue' was great and professional. Ms Snow and her team made me feel welcome from the first moment.

Good experience . Faded into an immortal sleep after 5 minutes receiving a facial and woke up with clear skin and super relaxed. Staff is very friendly and offered us a free drink on the roof top bar to wait for another friend who had a mani/pedicure. Good overall experience

Incredible experience. Tonight we were greeted by Ms. Snow who is a super kind young lady (she's also beautiful). She helped my friend and I decide on which massage to choose. She helped us communicate with our massuesse's which areas of our bodies we wanted to focus on.The whole experience turned out to be much more than we asked for. The massuesse's were absolutely fantastic. The steam room was great and everyone we came in contact with was pleasant (especially Ms. snow).If we are ever in the area again, we will be back for sure.

Fantastic treatments and service! :). We have just got back from this spa. The service we received from the manager Snow was fantastic! She made sure everything was perfect for us. I had a manicure and a facial, and my partner had a deep tissue massage. Both treatments were excellent! We are both now feeling relaxed again after a busy day exploring the city. Thank you!
Footmassage. Decided to go for a spontanous foot massage around the corner of our hotel. Worked out well and we were relaxed again to explore Hanoi by foot.

Rejuvenated. Went to this spa for a massage on the recommendation of the receptionist at my hotel, after a week of hiking around Sapa, was feeling a little worse for wear. Went to La Belle not knowing anything, Went for a Back and Head and Shoulder massage. BEST DECISION ever. Walked out of there so relaxed, so rejuvenated. Suffering from back pain when I overdo things, the massage I received allowed me to enjoy the rest of trip to Hanoi

I was there 3 times.... ...and always loved it. :) No waiting times, you are offered a drink upon arrival, once I even got a discount. Friendly, English-speaking staff.I always took the back massage for 300k.

Oasis above the street. My husband and I just returned from a truly amazing couples massage at La Belle Beauty Spa and Salon. We were greeted warmly, given warm tea and spa slippers, while we perused the massage options and treatments that they provide there. The establishment is decorated serenely and is very, very clean. In the massage area, we were provided with lockers for our clothes and silk coverup's to protect our modesty. I had chosen the Deep Tissue Massage and my husband, the Traditional Thai Massage. We both have regular massages in the states, and this massage was as good as any I have ever had. My husband felt the same way. Afterward, Snow took us up to the top floor, where I had a fabulous mango smoothie and my husband a mango lassie. It was the perfect way to end this relaxing sojourn.With all the many spa's advertising in Hanoi, I would say, "make sure you stop here. You will not be disappointed." By the way, the prices were very reasonable.

Couples Massage & Manicure/Pedicure. Amazing massage, and unparalleled hospitality. The manager Snow & her husband were very kind, even letting us take their spa slippers home so our pedicure would dry properly (as we were traveling and only in gym shoes when arriving). They also offered to help us find a card for our camera and any guidance in Hanoi. It's the best massage we have had in our travels through Thailand, Cambodia, and Vietnam. - thanks again! Josh & Andrea

impressive service. I had a facial and a massage and I was really happy with both.
They have the nice little extras like tea, coffee, fruit juice… when
you finish your treatment. Very nice place, I'll be going back!

great massage. I tried its Vietnamse massage as advice of the receptionist. I have tried Thai, Sweedish..with different spas but it was the first time with Vietnamese treatment. it was a great massage with skilful staff, I really enjoyed it.A tip for you, book and come in the morning because it is usually full in the afternoon and evening time. Moreover, they also have a discount of 10 - 15 percentage from opening hour to 12:00 PM.

Run away !!! They don't know how to do wax.. Run away! It is serious! They don't know how to wax! I want a bikini full wax, and it was paintful !! I am used to go to beauty centers in France, for bikini full wax. My skin was paintful, very red and harmful. I cannot even touch my skin ! And the staff cannot finish waxing... they confessed they don't know how to do that. And I have to pay !Run away !

best massage in hanoi. A great experience at the spa in Hanoi city!The body scrub massage and shirodhara relieve you of all the stresses - physical and mental! Everyone at the spa takes such good and personal care of you.. makes you want that it doesn't end at all. Book early to avoid disappointment. I am surely going to make further trips to Hanoi just to go to the spa again 

Great massage, good location. English spoken. . Dropped by on a business trip. Price is a little higher than others. But great location and nice building. English spoken quite well. Professional and clean place, really sturdy and comfortable massage tables. Worth a look for sure!

Professional and Relaxing. We got a 60 minute, Swedish couples massage here. There is a menu outside the entrance describing their services and prices. When we were looking at the menu, a person came down and offered us 20% off a service which was nice. The main reception area is on the 2nd floor where we were offered tea upon arrival and the massage room is on the 3rd floor. The massage room is a big room with 3 full length, cloth partitions separating the room into 4. We were given silk shorts, a wrap around top (for females) and flip flops to change into. We had 2 female masseuses and I appreciate that we got a full 60 minutes of hands-on massage. Overall, the staff was friendly and professional and the facilities were clean. After the massage, the manager invited us up to the 5/6 floors for a drink on the house. We unfortunately had plans or else we would have taken him up on the offer.
Skilled staff but rude, place not nice. 600 000 vdn for 60 min massage, after massage asking for tip and rude when i gave only 50 000 tip. Place was not nice. Not worth the money.

Massage was average; could have used better technique. I made a reservation after speaking to the owner. He gave 10% discount as an incentive to come in.I went with the Deep Tissue massage (450k vnd) for an hour. The receptionist and staff were friendly.Start off with a form to let them know which areas to avoid or focus on.I requested our own private room (my husband and I) and for the therapist to not talk. The receptionist reassured us that the therapists are trained not to talk, be loud or ask for tip. Which was followed.My husband has a hard Thai massage, which he enjoyed but wasn't the best.My deep tissue was parts relaxing but the therapist lacked technique as she repeated the same movement in the same area, which caused pain.I ripped my therapist 100k vnd ($5 used) and she seemed happy.I've had better massages in Nha Trang and Saigon. Given this is the more expensive spa for Vietnam, I don't think I would return here.

Expensive but worth it. Had a traditional thaimassagevery friendly welcome and a very good massage. Rather expensive (450k dong for 60 minutes) but totally worth itStylish waiting area.Massage area dark and not much decoration. Since i closed my eyes for the most time this was not a problem.I was offered free drink on the rooftop after massage (i think if you have treatment over 400k dong a free drink is included). I declined, so no comment on the rooftop from my side.
Nice place! Friendly staff!. Good prices, very friendly staff and the massages were great. Easy to get to. The staff offered tea and fruit as well. Would go again!

Great massages. My partner and I stumbled upon La Belle and thoroughly enjoyed it. Staff were very attentive and my partner felt great after his (he has back issues- best deep tissue he has had!) Would recommend but do barter the price as it was at the higher end of what you'd expect! Thanks La Belle :)

Wonderful. I've been in the steam room and also had a massage. The steam room is a nice offer and it felt good sitting in it before the massage. Only the floor was cold which made it a little harder to find a comfortable sitting position (there isn't enough room on the bench to spread your legs). Never the less, the massage itself was wonderful!! I had not had one this good in ages (or even ever). Otherways, the staff was extremly friendly and you get a free cup of coffee or tea at a nice sitting spot looking down on the streets. All in all, the spa is a little expensive but definetly worth the price if you want to have a relaxing time.

Nice experience, good spa!. I often travel to Hanoi because of my bussiness and my favourite relaxing time is going to Spa. I have got a VIP card of some spas but I prefer experiencing at different ones, it bring me interesting felling! I came to this Spa because it is near my hotel. It seems to be under new management, i am not sure but I felt like that. The new manager(may be) was very atentive to introduce the service and give me advices for the treatment with a pen and noted paper before giving it to therapist. Room was simple but it was clean and spacious. Therapist was professional and I found that all the notes were followed correctly. It was appreciated! The payment was discounted 10%, it is good tip for direct booking service or walking guest, i had been informed that. Good spa and nice experience!

Worst foot massage ever. Cons: 1) no change of clothing offered for massage. 2) damp towels on bed.3) inattentive masseuse - talking on the phone and replying text messages while giving massage. 4) rude masseuse - asking for tip. 5) super rude masseuse - asking for more tip when the tip given wasn't up to her expectation.6) masseuses were freelancers, not permanent staff (therefore no ownership and respect of the establishment). 7) the two masseuses were busy chatting with each other during the session - very noisy and not relaxing at all. 8) a/c was not switched on during the massage, the room became very stuffy. Pros: 1) warm greetings upon arrival by the man at the entrance.2) friendly staff, Cong at registration. 3) attentive and apologetic staff (Cong) offered us a half price upon hearing our bad experience with the masseuses. Frequent this establishment at your own risk!

Pathetic. I hate when people don't tell you upfront that they don't have rooms or space available. My family asked for 30 min foot massage but they kept going as they didn't understand English... Towels were not clean, lot of noise from outside and within the parkour. One thing we went for which is relaxation is the last thing you can expect here

Back again!. Once more visiting Ha Noi I went to La Belle for a 60 minuter swedish massage. I wasn't disappointed. It was really relaxing and done of very polite staff. I'm happy to say I still warmly can recommend La Belle Spa. I will always return here when I visit Ha Noi in the future

La Belle Spa. Great people - clean and reasonably priced. Staff very friendly and went above and beyond to help me find my wallet when I discovered I had left it in a taxi. Thought I would never see it or the money again but with their help I got it back - money and all my cards etc. Could not have done it without the help of the staff here. So grateful.

Great place to unwind. We purchased the Foot Spa package and it was great. The hostess was a pleasure to deal with and very friendly and accommodating. Felt relaxed through the whole experience and was a very good escape from the traffic and the rain for 90 minutes. Make sure you head up to the rooftop bar beforehand for a free beer (complimentary with the massage) and the spring rolls are tasty as well.

Great massage. I was looking for a massage and there are a number of options in the Old Quarter at various prices. Sometimes you get what you pay for so I decided to go with La Belle who were more expensive than surrounding establishments but who provided a nice facility. The offer of a 10% discount also enticed me in.I am glad that I did as my massage was spot on. I did not want a deep tissue massage but at the same time needed a robust relaxing massage. My masseur was able to quickly gauge my pain threshold and stay within that threshold for the entire massage.I did not have a booking and was able to be seen within 5 minutes. Soon after two other people were being seen to and there were a number of people in the reception area waiting for a massage when I left. All the staff were friendly, professional and spoke English fluently. Definitely a place to visit if you are looking for a massage.

not luxury but comfy and good. A bit pricey for Vietnamese standard(500-600k d /90min oil per person)but if you want to relax after hard day but like to avoid HOTEL thing, it's a good place to relax. massage skills were good(worth to pay), staff were friendly just one downside is that some masseurs need to take care of their nails. recommend this place!

Awesome services and awesome people . My husband and I went there, I had a pedicure and my husband had a full body massage, everything came up to $30 including tip, the staff were very attentive to our needs and genuinely friendly..It was our first day on Hanoi, and they recommend several places to go and things to do.It was such a.lovely environment, I have been to places with better facilities, their polish selection was limited, (which is even more so now that i broke a bottle). but this place beats it all with the friendly staff and professional service.We hope we get to go back there again.If not.. thank you guys so much for being such a wonderful part of our beautiful experience in vietnam.

Painful+relaxing = perfect massage . Best massage I've had in Asia! Perfect blend of being in pain and feeling relaxed, just a shame we hadn't booked longer... and couldn't have been more welcomed by the manager and staff.. very professional.With the stress of Hanoi this place was a very welcome relief, would highly recommend!

Relaxing and professional experience. We went to La Belle Spa in the late afternoon without booking and we were well looked after. I went for a massage & body scrub and my wife went for a foot massage plus pedi/manicure. The two massages were in the same room and were excellent. While daunting my massage included some back walking - but at no point did I feel out of my comfort zone.The owner and staff are very friendly and speak good English. When you think it can't get any better I surprised to find a bar upstairs where I waited for my wife's nails to be finished with a ice cold beer!
Awesome experience!!. Stumbled across this place and in the middle of a very busy city, it was a slice of tranquility. Everyone was so nice and the massage was quite enjoyable!

Foot treatment . Myself and my girlfriend spotted this place while walking around the city and decided to go in and have a look and book a pedicure and foot massage. The ladies (Sabrina and Nina) were very friendly and courteous, and really did a great job. We were very happy with the service.

The best massage in hanoi. Good place to relax in the old city. Reasonable price and very professional staff, we were offered a drink on rooftop restaurant. It was great when having a coffee and looking the busy street. Highly recommend!
Excellent massages by well trained masseur. Excellent spa with well trained masseurs. Pleasant setting and conveniently located in the Old Quarter of Ha Noi.

Worst massage ever. I have no idea why this place had all good ratings before as the best part of the massage was the AC. I asked for a strong massage and all I got was covered in gross smelling oil. The therapists would not stop talking to each other the entire time.

You get what you pay for.... Had a mani/pedi here - the manicurist was friendly, but was a lackluster experience. Just cleaned up and painted the nails - no softening of calluses or massage - took forever since only one girl knew how to apply the polish. Ah well...for $11.50, what can you expect
Great massage. Went to La Belle twice in 5 days. Great staff and really good massages. Very clean. Hot stone massage was amazing. Highly recommend it.

Hot stone massage . Massage was great and relaxing. Friendly staff and had a locker for valuables.
A deal of some freebies like a beer after wards did not eventuate.
Really good massage . Very relaxing and professional. Highly recommended. Free drink at the roof top bar afterwards. Nice way to pass a few hours.

Pedicure and manicure. A good experience. I had a manicure and a pedicure which were done by two members of staff to a high standard. They have only a few colours to choose from but I found a nice one so was happy.
Awesome people. We went to the Spa and restaurant. Both experiences were amazing. Highly recommend the roof top rest. The food was great and the staff working there are really nice. Well priced too.

la belle beauty spa and massage. what a fabulous place. The staff are so friendly which makes for a very relaxing time. It's so clean and tranquil. I had a foot massage that lasted just over 60 minutes and was the most calming massage that i have had.

Very Soothing and Relaxing. My wife and I had a great time in La Belle Spa! The service was outstanding and we really felt pampered! The Spa is also located in the Old Quarter of Hanoi and it's quite an experience to live it.My wife also got her nails done (or undone for that matter, since we just got married) and it was a great job! Not easy though.

Wonderful spa treatments, great staff, and really relaxing setting too :). The La Belle Spa in Ha Noi's Old Quarter offers marvelous treatments by a talented, super friendly, and excellent staff... The nice ambiance in both the rooms and waiting area make for a very relaxing experience indeed :) The receptionists speak excellent English, and can provide recommendations on the spa services that you're seeking. For a fraction of the costs for treatments that you'd pay outside of Viet Nam, be sure to take the time and enjoy a wonderful visit to La Belle -- you'll really enjoy it :))

Fantastic Service and Massage!. The spa is beautiful and clean. It looks professional and the staff are exactly that. I had a wonderful one hour aroma massage that was definitely worth my money and time. Great location too, right near the lake and shopping district. I would highly recommend this spa to anyone traveling and staying in Hanoi.

Excellent massage for relaxing surrounding by a kind atmosphere. When you arrive at the spa, you're welcomed with iced tea and litchis. Then you just have to chose your massage and you go to one relaxing room. I chose the soft massage and it was really relaxing. Then you had a free drink on the very nice rooftop if your massage is more than 400 000 dongs. We had a chat with the owner, he was really kind and all people in the establishment as well ! Go there and you will enjoy a great time!

Good massage and good value for money!. My husband and I booked this through our hotel as we heard good reviews about it. We were picked up and dropped off by taxi which the spa paid for, as well as a welcome drink and a free drink after the massage which was nice. The manager was really attentive and keen that we were happy with the service provided, and we felt well cared for. The actual massage (we opted for a couples oil massage) was really good, and we were really relaxed by the end of the hour. We paid 420,000vnd for a 60min oil massage which was a pretty good price I felt and worth it. ($19/£12)The only thing was that since it was a couples massage a male massaged my husband and a female massaged me, but there wasn't a divide of sorts, nor did the woman try to keep me covered much, and I felt I could have had some sort of privacy as there was another man in the room! After the massage both the massage therapists asked my husband if we would like to tip them, which felt like a forced tip as they asked for it - we went for other trips/tours of the city and have been to other massage places where they did not ask for a tip. It was a pretty nice massage place, not a cheap looking place, so it was a bit surprising that we got asked specifically to tip! When my husband did give small change they said it wasn't enough and asked for a bigger tip! That would be the only negative I would say, as it was a bit awkward. There is a restaurant upstairs on the top floor with a nice view of the bustling streets where they serve drinks and food (both Vietnamese and western), and the food is tasty.Highly recommended massage place :)

What a beauty!. After 2 days of trekking in Sapa, the one thing we were in dying need of was a massage to soothe our aching muscles. La Belle Spa was recommended to us, so we walked not far from our hotel and found them situated on a corner. My husband and I opted for a 90 minute massage. Blissful! Very relaxing and those muscles that were once aching and tired no longer in pain. After our massage the owner came to see us to see if we were satisfied then told us we could have a free drink upstairs at the restaurant. Once there though we saw other people's lovely meals and as it was now lunchtime, we decided to have a meal. The meal and drink were great. After our meal, the owner then called us a taxi to take us back to our hotel. A one way trip by taxi is also included in the cost of the massage. On their brochure it states pick up from hotel but since we had walked there we got our free ride home. Would recommend this place to anyone, great value for money and service number 1.

Best massage ever.... My boyfriend and I were walking pass this spa on a hot afternoon and decided to take a chance and see what the massage would be like. It was great, probably one of the best massages I've ever had (and I've had a lot). 10/10 definitely recommend it.
wonderful massage ever. Is a great experience to staying here for hot stone massage. they provided perfect service and make me release my stress from this tired trip.

Great hotel and staff. Staying at the hotel was a truly a wonderful exprience. The staff was very friendly and helpful, always greeting with a smile. They are relatively young but they carry themselves with the professionalism of many well known 4-5 star hotels. The room was immaculate and spacious. The dining was great and breakfast very adequate. We will go back soon. Thanks everything!!!

Best hot herbal massage and manicure. We are group 4 persons arange hot herbal massage with 25$ and manicure service 6$. We get wonderful time for relaxing and beautiful green color for manicure. They do perfect for my hand. Really wonderful for my style. Thank you very much!!!

La Belle... Great service. Had a fantastic message after a flight. Iron out all the kinks in my body. Hits the right spots. Great Service and friendly staff. There's even a small bar on top of the building. Couldn't recommend it more.

Best so far!. Very good massages! I had the hot herbal therapy massage - just amazing. Maybe a little more expensive than usual, but definitely worth it. Staff is really polite and funny. You get a complimentary drink and some snacks when you arrive and a free drink after your massage at the city view sky bar!

Excellent massage & munchies. After roughing it out over at Sapa, though to treat ourselves to a full body massage so stumbled upon this tall building City View Bar. La Belle Spa is situated on the 2nd and 3rd floor of this building and they are all interlinked. Got a full body oil massage with hot stone at 75 minutes for about USD25 which is an acceptable price. I got a male masseur and he exerted the right amount of pressure and skill on the tensed parts. After that we finished it off with drink over the City Bar on top at the 5th floor with a city view to polish off the relaxing experience. Best of all there was a discount as we were using the spa below. Just so happens it was Liberation Day as well at Hanoi and the streets were lively. One slight minus is that my female friend was a bit discomfort due to the privacy curtains not fully pulled back as all massages was done in the same area. Would drop by next time at Hanoi again to try out their other massages.
Great massage. We organized a massage after walking the streets of Hanoi for 2 days, it was magic, a great place for a massage.

Good massage. Recommend them - we had the oil all over body massage for back and legs, 90 mins. Well worth the time for relaxation. A drink (beer or softdrink) at the roof top bar is a nice extra to relax afterwards.

Recommend . Lovely massage, lovely staff, lovely environment!
I had the hot stones 70 min massage. Very relaxing and got a complimentary drink afterwards. Would recommend.

Best massage in Hanoi. Yes labell spa from France language. Really beautiful staff, style and excellent service. When we get massage after we get drink in beautiful city view coffee on top floor. And They arrange for us the lovely cake for my birthday. They made us drunk happy birthday. Very very happy!!! Thanks you everybody!!!!!!! I love alls of you!!!!!!!!

A perfekt place to relaxe. This massage place is definitely worth to visit. I had the hot-stone massage and I have never been more relaxed. I have heard bad story's about hot stone massage where they almost burn you, but the people here really know what they are doing and I did not feel uncomfortable once. I would definitely go back and recommend other people to go here.

Beautyful place!. Very good massage, friendly staff, really nice moment... We used the packages 2hr45 and feel refreshed and relaxed after the massage. And in here had small bar view. I liked it very much. We will come back here next year! Thank you very much... Recommend it!
Very very special body massage. Very very nice service, special style, hidden staff, good location. Thanks everybody. We will go back in september

Nice place for a lovely revival. I hightly recommend this lovely place : in the morning to take energy before visinting Ha Noi as much as in the evening to have a good relaxation before diner and night. My legs said "Thank you" to the very attentive woman who took care of me. And My husband was also happy to rest his back after a long trip in Ha Noi. Best regards to the team !
nice place, professional and atractive.. good massage. very nice welcome, greeting. all family together.foot, legs, body, face etc .... Thank you !
Very nice!!. Really nice moment, we had a massage all family together (4 people) and it was really pleasant, the employees are nice, fun and gentle!! ☺
Professional relax. The personal take care of you on a professional way. You feel like you get a new body when they are ready with you.

Very good massage in a nice little place. The massage was very good and the pressure being applied by the masseur is just right. Took a 2 hr package and feel refreshed and relaxed after the massage. After the massage, we could go to the rooftop for drinks and the environment is nice.Would recommend this place for people looking for authentic Vietnamese massage experience

Excellent massage in old quarters. I have been to this Spa in the outskirts of old quarters a couple of time when I been feeling tired. Every time I´ve been well cared for by the young and professional staff. They´re very polite and skilled in their performance of massage. Last time I went there, they were closed for refreshing work at the spa. The owner, Mr. Thomas showed me around and told me they will open a café at the 5th floor and a bar at the 6th floor. It will even be possible to order food there in the future. There is an elevator going between the 2nd and the 5th floor which is appreciated when it is 30-35 degrees and almost 100% humidity. It will be exciting to visit the refreshed La Belle Spa next time I go to Ha Noi during May. I can strongly recommend this place if you´re looking for a good massage.

Good location and service. I came here when coming back from Halong trip. I chose it because it was near my hotel, I was so tired after trip to walk more. It seemed to be a complex with a small bar and coffee on 4th & 5th floor. I asked for a cup of coffee while waiting for my turning. Its staff was young attentive and very professional. I enjoyed foot massage service with cost of 25$ for 45 minutes. Recommend it!

Fantastic massage. I went for a massage and left feeling great. The girl was fantastic, I was relaxed the whole time and she found all my sore spots. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a relaxing massage with a beautiful venue.I will return anytime I'm in Hanoi.

PERFECT MASSAGE. After a long flight into Hanoi a relaxing massage was required. I found La Belle Spa for that perfect massage. Thomas the owner welcomed me with open arms the price was fair and the lady's massage was amazing. I went back there 2 days later and had the same high standard personal touch. I'll be back when I next visit hanoi. You can even get a beer upstairs if you like as well. Thank you

Relaxing and professional massage. I have had many massages in asia over the years and this place was a pleasant experience . The staff were friendly and when it came to choosing which massage to have they were helpful. I chose a hot stone massage as they thought this would help my aching back . The masseur gave a incredible massage and I left felling much better than when I went in . I chose a 75 minute massage and from memory it cost about 25 dollars. It was truly relaxing and I received a free drink in their cafe after .Everything was handled quite professionally. I will return to this spa before I leave hanoi .
Excellent. Very nice facilities and excellent service. I had 90 min massage and 60 min foot scrub. Great prices and the owner of this establishment is very friendly and helpful. Excellent!!

Spa was divine!. I visited for the "happy hour" at 10am, so each 60 min service was 40% off. This discount was it comparable to other spas in the area in price. Yet, this spa was cleaner, more organized, smelled better, and gave a foot soak before you began your massage. Amazing!! Wish I found it earlier.

Best massage ever. I went here as i woke up early and decided i would give it a go. From as soon as you walk in the experience is amazing, being greeted with tea and then the hot stone massage left me feeling more relaxed than i have ever felt.

Himalayan Salt massage. Had 1 hour massage and it was fantastic. The service was great very attentive. Husband also had a relaxation massage and it was strong enough for him. Going back tomorrow for a facial.

Amazing service & treatment . During our stay at the hotel my partner & myself visited your spa for a most luxurious & professional treatment. I chose the hot stone massage, body scrub & facial, all of which were divine. The spa is extremely clean, massage rooms are very relaxing & the staff are very kind & wonderful at what they do. I plan to return again for another treatment during my stay at the hotel & can highly recommend.

Luxury spa in Hanoi. My fiance and I were given a free coupon from the hotel manger and it was the greatest gift.. It was relaxing, fun and gave us strength for a new day of traveling. Sure Hanoi is full of chipper places but if you want to pamper yourself in a luxurious spa with care for every small detail and a professional staff, this is definitely the spot.
most enjoyable stay . always friendly hotel staff who take note of minute details that has left us a deep impression.great restaurant food, service and welcome lobby helpdesk.

Phenomenal Service and Treatment. My wife and I did a 4 hour a spa day at La Siesta - what an amazing experience! If one comes to Hanoi and seeks spa treatment and does not go La Siesta they are a fool. They are the best in Hanoi hands down. The staff here is accommodating, friendly, and really puts their guests first. Our spa day was great and we were treated like a king and queen. Go for the gusto and do the 4 hour treatment - sauna, 90 minute massage, body scrub, and body wrap. You will feel like a million bucks when you leave.

Spa treatment was very good. Very clean rooms, Julie the masseuse was excellent, attentive and had the right technique. The room was ideal temperature, clean and tidy. The floor tiles were charming. Highly recommend this spa. The tea at the beginning and end was tasty and soothing.

Amazing experience!!. Just came back from our (my husband and i) 2nd massage following yesterday's and we're absolutely sure that everyone's got to at least give this place a shot. it is going to be worth it. sure, it is probably pricier than anywhere you can go in hanoi. but as we have tried at least 2 others before this, let me assure you that the masseuses here are very experienced and would know how to handle and target problematic areas. I was experiencing very bad lower back pain from kayaking and was worried if the massage is going to worsen it. it didn't and in fact made it better. don't know how else I can convince you to give it a try but if there is time for just one spa or massage experience, please try Hanoi la siesta! we had the himalayan salt stone massage and the relaxation massage (both 90minutes sessions). I didn't get the names of our masseuses (shame on us) but the lady who was managing the desk at the spa (mika) was lovely and very very thoughtful. can't thank everyone enough. definitely love to be back when we can!

So good I went 3 times in 3 days. . This place is so professional. Chau, the trainee greeted me and as I am fairly simple in my spa tastes, she recommended the herbal treatment. I loved it. Other clients I spoke to all loved the variety of treatments they chose. I have had lots of massages in Australia and Asia. This place has no awkward moments you may have experienced elsewhere. There is a personal safe for your valuables. They supply paper underwear. They leave the room when you change. My masseuse was Julia. She was fabulous. I love a masseuse who can walk on your back. On one occasion, I was so relaxed, I fell asleep. Miss Kim is in charge of the La Siesta Spa chain and if you can't get into one in a time that suits you, she will try for another nearby. Excellent service. I wish I had 3 to 4 hours to spare so I could opt for a package. I might go back now for the foot treatment.

3 hours of bliss!. I booked the approximately 3 hour spa package consisting of an hour long massage, a sea salt body scrub and a signature facial. It was a thoroughly pampering experience. I like a strong massage and my diminutive masseuse delivered. I left feeling thoroughly relaxed and with smooth, glowing skin. I missed dinner to go for the 3 hour long spa session and they thoughtfully provided a light snack at the end of it, even when it was past their operation hours! I highly recommend the spa treatments here!
Amazing . Fabulous place! Had a package that lasted 3 hours it included a facial, hot stone massage and body scrub followed by lunch! Pure bliss!! Recommend for a day of pampering!
Amazing Himalayan Massage . Superb massage. Lovely venue. Excellent customer service. Thank you so much. Hopefully I will have one each day. 40% discount for the morning is great value.
Best spa. Very nice and clean place, welcoming employees. The massage can be customized by telling where we want to get massage, where not to touch, what pressure and what essential oil to use.
Very relax experience. Our therapist,Hoai and Nga, are very friendly and take care of every request we mentioned. Also, they are so humble and diligent therapists we had ever met. Highly recommend!

Quite good for Hanoi but massage is average. My wife and I visited the spa in Lo Su street where Siesta started. The company now has three different hotel/spa's in the area. We have tried various spa's in Hanoi and generally were disappointed with the quality and cleanliness. Even the spa at the Metropole lacks finesse. Considering the good reviews we were curious to try this one out.It proved to be one of our better experiences in Hanoi, but rated on a national scale there are quite a few better alternatives in Saigon.It is a small spa on the second floor of a downtown hotel. The reception is very friendly and helpful. They serve their own blend of black tea with cinnamon and ginger which is delicious.The massage rooms are good and clean, but not special.The spa provides different packages and we went for a 90 minute massage and a hot rub.Although the masseuses were friendly the actual treatment was only slightly better then average we both concluded. There was that lack of finesse in the massage we have found more often in Hanoi probably due to a lack of training. The limited range in skills quickly leads to you getting bored with the treatment. In our case, have the hot rub as well it did not reach the point of irritation.All in all one of our better experiences in Hanoi, but we are still looking for a spa that is not only clean and friendly, but offers a massage that can compare with the better places in South East Asia.

Excelent . My wife and I booked into this spa to relax after a busy and enjoyable day sightseeing in Hanoi.The staff members were both friendly snd attentive and on arrival we were given refreshment and the opportunity to freshen up with a welcome shower. The whole establishment was very clean with wonderful relaxing aromas to enhance the tranquility. We opted for a joint couples room and the facility were happy to oblige us.We spent the next 90 minutes been throughly pampered with highly professional masseurs. We are frequent visitors to spa (monthly) and this was one of the best we have enjoyed this year.We are very happy to recommend this Spa (and the adjoining hotel too) Enjoy.

Magic hands. We had a very nice welcome on the second floor (skip the doormen, they just sell) with herbal tea. Wonderful professional massage very relaxing and superb techniques. Relaxation after the massage is also included. Recommended!

Great Spa experience. The service was wonderful as was the ambiance, tea and pricing. Definitely go there when in Hanoi. You go to a greeting area first and receive a welcome tea and then are brought in the service rooms with great ambiance, low calming music and wonderful spa technicians. After the service you receive another delicious tea. Everything was wonderful.

Wonderful Escape from Busy City. It is hard to imagine a tranquil spot in the middle of the Old Quarter, but that is exactly what La Siesta provided. We were at the Ma May Street hotel and had to walk south a few blocks to the other spa, since our hotel was booked. The treatments were fantastic. The relaxation room was mats on the floor. But, impressed they had a relaxation space given the location. The therapists were all highly professional, but lacked some communication skills. They knew enough to understand most of what you wanted. They provided a selection of oils. The price is dirt cheap by US standards. With the hotel discount, an hour massage was $35 and that included a tip. At these prices, we should get a massage every day.

Fantastic!. In the middle of warm, noisy and crowded Hanoi, a very quiet, peaceful and relaxing place.Staff members are so respectful, very nice and welcoming.And about massages... Might be the best of my life!This spa feels like heaven!It's more expensive than foot or back massages you can have in the street, but it's so worth it! And there are many promotions on their website (we had 25% discount)And almost forgot: fresh spring rolls from the hotel restaurant after massage... Amazing!

Great experience . Went there on our first day in Hanoi and it was great. A relaxing massage of 60 minutes costs about 750th vnd (35€). Usually they have promotional prices throughout the day, which gets you 20%-40% discount.The service was really nice and and staff made everything possible to make us feel relaxed. Definitely recommend

Amazing service and relaxing message. Dropped in here for a massage, they were booked out but offered to take me to their new hotel and spa which was about a 5min bike ride away. The ladies here were great, the spa was new and lovely and the massage was just what I needed. Highly recommend.

Relaxation plus. I have enjoyed many spa sessions but La Siesta is one of the best. Staff are professional and friendly. Products were so good I wanted to know where to buy them. Had facial, wrap and massage and it was amazing. I finished with light refreshments compliments of the hotel. Would do it all again tomorrow. Thanks La Siesta........

Great Spa experience, warm and inviting environment. Decided to visit this Spa as we stayed across the road, and heard great reviews. Was greeted very warmly by Nika and her colleague who helped us with our appointment booking and patiently walked us through their selection of treatments.Plus points:- reception area was nice and made us felt right at home- served great ginger tea- couple rooms available- pretreatment survey to understand our needs and which part of the body to focus the massage onOverall experience was enhanced by the friendliness of the staff who chatted with us and gave us tips to find the best local food. We even went back a 2nd time during our 6-day stay in Hanoi for another set of spa treatment because we really enjoyed our 1st one.
Good experience. The receptionist and our therapists were terrific. We would go back and recommend to our friends. Nice facility and friendly and talented staff.

thoroughly energising 3 1/2 hours... HAPPY HOUR..between 10-2. I treated myself and best friend who is involved in the beauty business to a morning at La Siesta Spa 1. we both thought it was so special. the therapists we both had were so connected to what they were doing, it just made it wonderful.. their touch was a sensation. We both enjoyed it so much. after the treatment we were led to the restaurant and given tea and fresh spring rolls to finish the morning. highly recommended.

Clean, accomodating & very comfortable . La Siesta Trendy is a good option for Hanoi, it's on the quieter edge of the old quarter & the rooms are quiet for sleeping. The staff were very attentive & friendly with a good comprehension of English. The rooms are spacious & the bed was extremely comfortable & good quality. The internal spa was also very good. A good option for the travelling westerner.

Ultimate Service!! 　究極のサービス！！！. I have been here 2 days ago. I were warmly welcomed by Ms. Loan, Rosie - receptionist with special ginger cinnamon tea and sweet lotus seeds. They were so helpful to help me . While I visit spa, I was walking in the rain, so, my shoes and socks were wet. They let me use dryer for dry my socks. It is outstanding service. Also, Ms Loan know very well about hospitality. I finish to eat lotus seed, so, She understood that I like lotus seeds. When I get out from Spa, She gave me a small gift in a paper bag. After I arrived home, I found Lotus seeds !!! It is ultimate service !!! 　　Rosie is Excellent!!!I hope to visit there again there soon.Jimmy from Bangkok2日前にこのスパを訪れて、受付のRosieの心温まるサービスを受けた。生姜の入ったシナモン茶と蓮の種のお菓子がとても美味しくて、健康に良かったのだ。それに加えて、雨で湿った私の靴下をドライヤーを使って乾かさせてくれた事に感謝しています。　普通、こんなサービスはしてくれない。　それに加えて驚いたのが、Rosieは本当の意味でのホスピタリティーを理解してることだった。出されたLotusSeedsを全部食べた私に、帰路につく時、プレゼントとして、LotusSeedsのお土産をくれたのだ。　もう、これは、究極のサービス　と言って良い。　こんな素敵なRosieに会えて、本当に良かった。　　直ぐにでも又、訪れたいと思っている。この店はお勧めです。

Great service!!!. I and my friend have been here few days ago. We were warmly welcomed by Ms. Kim -spa manager and Ms. Loan - receptionist with special ginger cinemon tea and sweet lotus seeds. They were so helpful to help us choose best treatment. Why I decided to use Himalaya salt stone? Because I'm often tired from working, so need to relax and strong pressure on my shoulder and back. Therefore, when I met ms. Giang- one of best therapists, I thought that I come to right spa. Oh em gi!!! This is my paradise, Giang provided best service I have ever done. I will come back here for sure. Highly recommend it!!!.Thank you very much to treat me as a Queen.

Wonderful, professional service. Had a herbal therapy and basic facial and it was absolute bliss. The servicing was very professional and high end. Spa was comfortable and clean, with a lovely relaxing atmosphere. Would higly recommend!

Nice high end spa! . My partner and I decided to visit this spa on our last day in Hanoi as a treat. The foyer is very nice and the decor smart and welcoming. The staff were very friendly and put us at ease. We were given tea and sweets on arrival. We both chose a 60min all body relaxation massage. The room was peaceful, softly lit with gentle pipe music. We both agreed that the massage was really good and my partner was so relaxed she actually fell asleep! By comparison with other spas in Hanoi this place isn't cheap but still much cheaper than the UK for this sort of quality establishment. There is a 'happy hour' affording good discounts so enquire when you book. All in all this is a high quality spa and one of the best massage places we've tried. Highly recommend.

Amazing service, great prices. I visited Hanoi La Siesta Spa after a long day of walking and sore feet. I was greeted with wonderful tea to enjoy in a very relaxing environment. After the Total Foot Treatment I was relaxed and rejuvenated. The staff was amazing and the service was a total luxury experience.

Relaxing spa. My friend and I came here for the 90 minute hot stone massage. We started the treatment with hot tea and were able to choose the essential oil to be used during the treatment. The massage itself was excellent along with the facilities. Left feeling relaxed and refreshed after a long trip to get to Hanoi. Staff is extremely friendly and helpful throughout

Great spa, great prices, great staff. There are so many places in Hanoi that offer massage, facials, it can be hard to know which one to pick. So glad I found this place. It's a refuge. Walking in, you are greeted with smiles and hot tea. The treatment rooms are comfortable, quiet and calming, and I got a great massage and foot treatment -- the lady who worked on me was tiny but she was super strong and super committed to giving me great service. And, I had a lovely time chatting with the staff while I was paying. (I was also thrilled to find out they have great discounts available.) So glad I found this place towards the beginning of my work trip to Hanoi.

A great experience. Both my husband and I enjoyed the spa treatments so much that we visited La Siesta Spa (Branch 1) twice during our 5-day tour in Hanoi. Its menu offered quite a number of selections for body and face. We had our massages done in the morning in order to enjoy a special discount of 40%. Overall, it was a wonderful experience.

Number 1 Attraction in Hanoi!. The La Siesta Spa is second to none the best spa my sister an I have ever been to. Ms Kim (the Spa Manager) is absolutely delightful, very friendly and always ensures you have the best experience possible. I would recommend asking her for recommendation before booking treatments as she has excellent suggestions. We thoroughly enjoyed the treatments and time in the spa. A special thank you to Kim and her team for making our time memorable and happy. The 90 minute Herbal Treatment and 20 minute Herbal Bath were amazing! I would come back to Hanoi just for the Spa!We visited two of the La Siesta Spas in Hanoi (branch 1 and branch 2).BRANCH 1: Hanoi La Siesta Spa 1, 2nd floor of Hanoi Elegance Diamond hotel at 32 Lo Su Street, Old Quarter, Hanoi. Branch 1 is the smaller of the two spas and dies not have the herbal bath but we were extreme happy with the interior and experience we had.BRANCH 2: Hanoi La Siesta Spa 2, 3rd floor of Hanoi La Siesta Hotel & Spa at 94 Ma May Street, Hanoi. Branch 2 has a lounge waiting area and herbal baths. It was pure luxury!

Try the "herbal therapy". Tried their herbal therapy massage with the ylang ylang oil, after the massage with oil they put some heated plant / flower seeds to absorb the oil from your body. Th seeds are placed in some small cotton bag and heated, they use that to rub all over you to absorb the oil and it smells nice as well. Unlike other normal oil massage where they leave you feeling a bit oily even after they wipe you down, this one you come out feeling fresh and light with no oily feeling at all. If you go for regular oil massage, give this a try. It's a different experience & helps to sleep well at night. Good to try after long day out on foot exploring Hanoi.

Best birthday ever. My best friend and I happen to share the same birthday. We went to la siesta for a full spa day and purchased their earth package. We couldn't be happier with the results.Their customer service is first rate and their massuesse's are top notch. You can't beat the value they provide.Also, the surprised us by coming out and singing happy birthday to us! They gave us the most delicious cake too. We have never had an experience like we did at la siesta. Go there, you won't regret it!

An escape from busy hanoi. The staff there were amazing so accommodating. Rosie is particular was so sweet and gave my friends and I Vietnamese sweets when we left. The salon was super clean and the massage was amazing. Would highly recommend it

Best Massage In Vietnam!. Been to 3 different spa places during my 3 week stay in Vietnam, none tops La Siesta! It simply boils down to having properly trained masseuse! Yes, many places are in fact (much) cheaper. And it may turn out you get a positive experience from one and not the other, but @La Siesta, you're likely paying for consistency. I've since recommended then to 3 other friends all of whom agreed their massage experience was best here. I'll definitely be coming back!

Absolutely Excellent. I am one of those people who definitely adhere to the slogan, "No Massage, No Holiday" so have had my fair share of massages over the decades. The 90 min Swedish massage that I had at Hanoi La Siesta Spa rates right up there with the best of them. Excellent attention was given to personal sore spots and the pressure was exactly as requested. The ambience matched the quality of service. Definitely recommend

Wonderful Spa Experience!!!. My parents, husband, and I had massage and facial services at La Siesta Spa while staying at their hotel Hotel Diamond Elegance and they were awesome! The service was exceptional and the treatment was so relaxing. We loved it so much that we booked four more treatments for two days later. Also the prices are fantastic!
La Siesta Spa. Very peaceful with expert masseuse and plenty of choice of treatments. Firm massage is particularly good and relaxing.

Superb Spa. Visited the spa whilst staying at the Elegance Diamond hotel. Excellent range of treatments, lovely surroundings and friendly staff.Take advantage of the happy hour (40% discount for morning bookings) and the very complete earth package also includes a light lunch.The staff were great, recommended the Red Bean restaurant (#3 in Ha Noi), booked it for us and also arranged a 10% discount.Happy days at La Siesta Spa!

whoever want to luxury spa.. go here. Every member was good at english. So if something to ask to them, they could understand well and treated.. And they asked to me frequently, about the feeling or condition. So good for me.

The Best! . This should be number 1 in Hanoi! Highly recommended Spa! Peaceful ambience, staff who really look after you and discuss your requirements. You can enter this Spa and leave feeling content and happy with the service that you receive. I have recommended it to lots of people I met in Hanoi. For the massages, you can trust they will find what you need. Also, the manager at the Spa (as well as the receptionist and masseurs I met) were absolutely awesome and the business should be very happy to have them there. I'm glad they are there, as it makes for a great place. I look forward to visiting again when I can.

Great Experience. I booked the spa before the journey and it is very smooth to communicate with the staff. The staff at reception is super friendly, she is so considerate about the clients feeling. When we told her our mom cannot speak English, she tried to learn how to pronounce "stronger" or "softer" in Chinese for the massage. The spa room is clean and nice and the experience is nice and we would definitely visit again if we go to Hanoi in future.

Worth every single penny. We had 3 massages in 5 days at this SPA. It was connected to our hotel. We ventured elsewhere one day when it was fully booked and the experience was No where near as good. The therapists were very professional and talented.

Wonderful spa that you can't miss!. We finished the old quarter walking and it was too earning for dinner. After a drink nearby, we decided we have a treat. We went for this spa and had a foot massage. The staff was so nice and professional. We each were asked for the concern, strength and focus part before the massage started. We were given a private room with relaxing light background music. And the therapist was not chatty which I personally appreciate a lot! We were well treated and was delighted afterwards. Well energised for dinner!!
Wonderful experience!. Had a facial booked as a Christmas present and was very impressed with the service at La Siesta spa. Customer service was excellent as was the facial.

amazing experience. i experienced an amazing 4 hour "ocean package" with a friend and i would highly recommend this spa. the staff were wonderful and friendly and were very apologetic that there was some outside construction noise that you could hear - but it didn't ruin the experience. i would recommend booking in advance and coming before midday as there are discounts on services - but it is still very reasonably priced. I paid approx. AU$100 for a 4 hour service (with a discount) which i thought was an amazing price.thank you so much to the staff for a wonderful experience. i will defiantly be back

Not Quite As Good As Advertised. I booked a package (sauna, herbal bath, massage, facial and body scrub) for me and facial treatment for my wife. We chose this spa based on the reviews and was rated as number 1 in Hanoi. However it's not quite as good as advertised or reviewed. The service was great and the body scrub was excellent. The lady was very polite and always smiling. The room was nice but not properly insulated from noise. I can hear conversations at the reception which had taken away the quietness of the place that I came for. I went for spa not just for smiles but for treatment. I didn't get the herbal bath, she just offered me to shower. The massage was ordinary. The lady kept on hitting my spinal chords and my back near the spinal is still hurting whilst writing this review. The massage steps were not consistent. She would do one set of steps on my right side and skipped some steps on the left. The facial treatment was ok but would have been better if the lady massaged my face rather than just applying the facial products. She massaged my head and shoulder whilst waiting for the facial product to set in which was nice.Overall, 3 stars.

Best deep-pressure body massage evah !. Although I stayed at a hotel down the street, I used the spa services at La Siesta and had one of the best 90-minute massages ever from 'Nga' who also goes by the name Julia. For those who enjoy deep pressure, I highly recommend her technique, which was superb, similar to a Thai massage. She was able to get rid of a mid-back kink that had plagued me for many months. I only wish I had given her a bigger tip and want to let future customers know it's all right to give 50% or more of the massage cost as a tip -- I regretted not having more cash in hand for Nga, who earned it. Especially because the massage prices are very low compared to France or the US. The spa was small, quiet, clean and very, very nice all around. -- there is no need to go to the Metropole Hotel and pay way more.
calm and good.. calm atmosphere and good spa service. I have no doubt visit again when I visit Hanoi next time.

Hanoi La Siesta Spa. It was my first time visiting to Hanoi and La Siesta Hotel. The December winter weather, freshest vegetables in almost every of our meals and the locals' excellent service oriented spirit, has left me with such a fabulous memory of Hanoi.Apart from the well-organized 4 days 3 night tour to Hanoi Old Quarter and Ha Long Bay by La Siesta Hotel, the massage was another amazing experience I had together with my friends. The complimentary spa / massage service was one of the highlights of the package tour. Together with my friends, total 6 of us were so well-pampered by the dedicated, friendly and warm masseurs after returning from the 2 days cruise to Ha Long Bay. We will certainly return to Hanoi again.

Amazing staff and massage. I've spent the last few weeks testing many spas in Vietnam and found this experience at La Siesta to be the most welcoming, clean and relaxing by far. A great focus on customer service makes the difference; the staff's openness to conversation, and welcoming tea for example. Luckily, I discovered this place on the day I left Vietnam, so left with great last memories. p.s Make sure to check out the spa's promotions before midday!!

Wonderful Relaxation Treatment at Hanoi La Siesta Spa. My 90-minute deep tissue relaxation treatment at Hanoi La Siesta spa was WONDERFUL. It all takes place in a serene atmosphere with tea seved before and after.

Best customer service possible!. We visited la siesta spa in hoi an and after having a great experience we decided to go to their branch in hanoi as well. The staff were lovely and very accommodating. once our massage started we were not happy with the temperature of our room. It was slightly colder than what we would have liked it to been.Once we were done with our massage we mentioned this to the host and she apologized and acknowledged they had a problem with their heating system. She was very apologetic and did not let us pay for our massages. We insisted on paying but she would not accept.The massages were both unreal- AMAZING!! def recommend this spa.

A moment of zen. After my husband got a massage, he strongly recommended that I do the same, so I scheduled an appointment for the next day. While the facilities are excellent in design for privacy and clean, it is the staff who make this a memorable experience. As others have written, the staff are friendly, accommodating, and professional. While you complete a massage preference form, a nice cup of tea and the calm atmosphere helps you transition into a relaxed state of mind. Enjoy!

excellent. we visited this branch @ Lo Su twice, once after our Halong trip and another the very next day.
