My therapist was really able to find my sore spots and work out all the kinks! It was much better than a generic massage and I didn't feel like she was just "going through the routine" as is at other spas. I would highly recommend getting a massage at Omamori Spa!!

Wonderful place to get a massage. The people that work at Omamori Spa do the most to ensure that you get a very relaxing and beneficial massage. The blind and visually impaired massage people are very talented and attuned to your every need. I will go back there again the next time I am in Hanoi. I hope others take advantage of this wonderful place too. And it is not expensive.

Amazing experience with unique people. I had a 5-day visit in Vietnam, and 3 days of it in Hanoi...I arrived there very early in the morning after a very long day, with extreme back pain...most of the places were closed, until I eventually found OMAMORI SPA, where I received a lovely welcome, with hot Tea and a detailed explanation of their unique social non-profit enterprise that provides employment for the Blind community in Vietnam. The atmosphere in the spa is very relaxing, extremely clean and nicely designed. The massage was excellent! Definitely one of the most professional I've encountered. This was followed by another hot tea and a nice conversation with the Managers...All-in-All - an amazing experience on my first morning in Vietnam!

Indulgence with a great social enterprise. I must admit to having some misgivings at first but decided to try Omamori out a few weeks ago...and boy, was I impressed! My massage therapist was so skillful I wouldn’t have known she was blind if I hadn’t been told. The staff were polite and professional, and the spa is clean, quiet, and welcoming. Not to mention being a heartwarmingly tangible way of empowering the less fortunate. Will definitely be back!
Great experience!. Visited the Mido spa for a 2 hrs aromatherapy massage and it was great! The masseur, Vy, did a fantastic job :)

Wonderful and very affordable massage!!. After walking around Hanoi all day, my back and legs were killing me! I found Mido Spa on trip advisor. It was close to our hotel in the Old Quarter and very easy to find. It was hard to believe how affordable the massage prices were (coming from USA where they can be pretty expensive) I got a great upper back/neck massage. It was so good, I decided to get a foot massage too.. very relaxing and therapeutic!! Hoan was my massage therapist- she is great at what she does!! Also very friendly and made sure I was comfortable and happy during the entire process. The spa itself was also very clean and nice atmosphere and loved the hot green tea after the massage. Overall- great experience!!
Fabulous. Booked for one hour ended up extending to two hours. Ms. Ngoc gives wonderful massages and easily the best I've had in Vietnam.

Love Mido Spa!. I've been going to Mido Spa for 3 years now, and always have a positive experience. I usually get the Swedish massage for 75 minutes which costs $25. They always greet you with tea, and give you a delicious lemon drink afterwards. Their masseuses are well trained; I've had some horrible massages in Vietnam, one where I couldn't walk for a week without extreme lower back pain. I always feel great after Mido :)

Quite a treatment. Foot massage/parafin oil treatment was just the thing our tired legs needed after the long flight and a day of walking around. Also some extra neck massage etc that weren't metioned in the package - great indeed.
Au top. One of the Best massage i made in Vietnam. Even the bikini waxing was perfect. Hai is a wanderfull massage therapist.
Great massage, great service !!. One of the best massage I had in Vietnam. Ngoc is very professional and skilled. I recommend the Coconut package. Enjoy guys !

Good massage and clean!. Saw the reviews online and went over to give it a try.. massage was good and comfy. Tried the aromatherapy massage where they gave you 5 types of oil to choose from. It's more pricey 430,000 dong for 1hr massage, but you will feel comfortable inside. Was lucky there's nobody else in the room too.. The receptionist and the massage therapists are friendly, gentle and professional.. What I like was that they ask us to fill up feedback form to improve their services and whether the therapists asked for tips. I find that very assuring..

Lovely massage. Very clean and professional spa. We opted for the 30 minute Indian back neck and shoulder massage- should have booked one for longer so going back today for another treatment! The staff are friendly and we felt very well looked after from the moment we walked in.

Great massages. I've had 3 great deep tissue massages (Sport Massage) by Phuong and Hein. Both women are talented massage therapists with Phuong being the stronger of the 2, but both are also gentle and aware.

Awesome experience. I read the reviews on Tripadvisor so thought I would give it a try. Oanh was my massage therapist and she did a wonderful job. The facility is clean and modern, the staff is very friendly and helpful. I highly recommend Mido Spa!
Fab massage. Great massage, my therapist, Phuong was fantastic the staff were welcoming and made such an effort to make you feel comfortable and relaxed. Great place!
Excellent service. Everyone was so lovely here! My therapist Thanh was so kind and the hot stone massage and spa pedicure were so relaxing! Would definitely come back again :)

Terrible place and massage. This was a really disappointing experience. I truly wonder how this place can achieve such a high ranking on TripAdvisor! The place is located in the old quarters. Inside is nice and clean but nothing special. We had made reservations beforehand but it still took a long time for them to get ready and organized. Once we had selected from the menu and decided on the scent of oil we were taken upstairs in two different rooms. The bed was nice and comfortable and the room temperature as well. The massage itself was horrible. Not attentive and without purpose and plan. The massesuse literally seemed like she could not care less about me and just wanted the 60 minutes to be over. A huge let down from high expectations!

Great massage!. Happened to stubble upon this outlet while walking around old quarters area, impressed by its decoration and decided to make a reservation.It's slightly expensive but Its definitely worth it! The owner is kind enough to give us a slight discount due to our group size! I went for a traditional Vietnamese massage which is fantastic , the masseur used pressure point, include clapping technique. The massage was so comfort that one of my friend even doze off during the session! The masseur was very polite and keep asking if we are ok with the strength throughout the massage, thumbs up! Overall a very enjoyable & relaxing session, with superb service!

Perfect massage. I was looking for a sporty massage with focus on legs after being on the road for a while. The staff were super flexible and did 1/2 a sport massage and 1/2 of another which was a perfect combination for me. 1h = 450'000 dongs. Might seem expensive compared to the street massage but you don't have the same service. Totally worth a visit!

Save yourself the time. Booked a time for 4 people Seemed we unknowingly booked another location than what we thought which was no issue st all The lady at the reception was super kind asked for our massage info which we provided We being the king of SPA, the SPA diva, the 12 year old who has been to more SPAs than most people and Always Happy Granny It might be that we were asked sbout preferences but they were not followed at all Areas that we had called attention we not even touched or very brieflyThis place really is not worth the time Of 4 massages only one was decent One og us had the spoerts massage and one the therapedicthe however the two massages given were identical except for the fact that one theapist was not on the phone during the massage I read all the reviews here and really do not understand that we could have gone to the same place This is thr only massage place we have been to in Hanoi but I am sure it can be much better and not least better value for money

Average manicure and pedicure . We visited at lunchtime and my friend had a spa pedicure and I had a manicure. It was average because I was not asked about the shape of my nails and they were filed into a very square shape. I asked for them to changed but one nail looks rather odd. Pedicure was better but no moisturiser was used! We said we felt it was average when we left and the manager kindly gave us a 30% discount.

Great Foot Massage. I had a trip to Ha Long Bay and Sapa and the foot was feeling weary so I stopped by for a foot massage since it was recommend. It wasn't a disappointment. The masseuse was really nice and did a great job with the foot massage. The ambiance fits nicely and really soothes you down to relax. The place was clean and well decorated. I also chatted the receptionist, I believe her name is Huong. She was very friendly and helps you with any questions needed with that cute smile of hers. Great place for a relaxation.

Lovely Spa Experience for two. We had facials, massages, pedicures and manicures: over three hours of wonderful service. The staff Mai and Ngoc provided great service in our own private room. The traditional Vietnamese massage was particularly wonderful. Excellent value for money, relaxing and rejuvenating.

Very good message and great space . They have a separate room for foot massage so it is very peaceful and relaxing. No distribution of people walking in and out of the main door. The massage itself is very good. Really enjoy it. The place is clean and well departed. Massage ladies really pay attention to massage my feet and not chit chat among them self. Really has a good experience.

Thai massage for 2. Walked in after reading some positive reviews - price is not cheap in Vietnamese standards but we were ok paying a little more as the place looked very professional, rooms and facilities spotless. Mr. Tuan and Ms. Hien gave us a 60m Thai massage which we enjoyed very much. Recommend after returning from Sapa or Halong Bay!

They know what they're doing :-). Me and my girlfriend had quite some massages over the last couple of weeks in Asia. Mido Spa was our favorite :-)We went to their Spas 2 days in a row for a massage. The 2nd day we had a massage (Mido Special) by ms. Hien and ms. Phuong...they were awesome! We had a firm massage and our bodies felt much more flexible after the massage. Thanks again :-)

Robyn Pryor. I visited this place twice on the recommendation of our motel staff. My first visit was for a 30 min back massage to loosen the muscles from air travel. The second time I visited, I had a 30 minute foot and leg massage to help with swollen feet and ankles. The staff on both occasions were courteous, friendly and professional. I was given a complimentary drink both before and after my massage. I used free wifi in reception while I waited and extremely good massage service and value for money. I have no hesitation in recommending this practice and would definitely visit again if given the opportunity.

Relaxing massage. I came for a relaxing massage after a month and a half of solid travel. Ms Phoung delivered an excellent traditional Vietnamese massage! Mido spa was very professional and clean and I'm sure that I'll be back.

Welcome Relief. Arrived in Hanoi at 530am today and came across this Spa whilst wandering before we could check into our hotel.Our whole group ended up getting a variety of treatments and from the minute we walked in, until we left we knew we had made a very good choice. Three of us has the 1 1/2 hour foot massage and scrub - it was awesome and I feel ' I could walk 500 miles'. The best for sore travellers feet.

Great service and massage. Our visit to Mido Spa was relaxing and very enjoyable. Khuyen has fantastic and was great to talk to and share our different cultures. At the end we had great fun with the girls trying to teach each other how to pronounce our names what a laugh.
Very relaxing. This spa was fantastic quite a surprise to find such a gem in the busy old quarter very easy to find and the massage was fantastic it's the best I have had
Best in Hanoi. Went to a few places while in Hanoi and this was easily the best. We went in the afternoon and were treated like royalty!

"Fantastic Traditional Thai Massage". I have had lots of Traditional Thai massages over the years but mainly in Thailand so I decided to try one at Mido Spa in Hanoi. All I can say is that Thanh1 was just fantastic and she clearly knew what she was doing, stretching every sore and tired muscle in my body. This type of massage is not for the light hearted and I asked for firm and that's what I got for 70 minutes. I felt great when I left and sore back after sitting on a plane for a long time is feeling much better. I will return before heading home and highly recommend taking the time to go there as they offer a wide range of massages, they are very professional, kind and friendly staff. I would highly recommend you make this your spa choice in Hanoi and also ask for Thanh1.

Professional and relaxing. Very clean and professional at this spa. I decided on the hot stone massage and I was really pleased with my choice. It's slightly harder than a Swedish massage and it'll be my 1st choice from now. Highly recommended out of the vast choice here.

I like it here. My bf and I went there last weekend on our rest day from the GYM, stretching our muscles and relaxing. It was very good experience and we both decided to go back every week.Everything was good in general, room are not too big but clean and comfortable. We had steam bath and Aroma massage. It was very kind of the receptionist to explain us about the service which we were confused about. Two young therapist ladies were very friendly and professional. It was totally worth money.Highly recommend this place and I cannot wait to come back
Fantastic Shiatshu massage. I am very happy with the message from Ngoe and Thauih, very friendly and professional, highly recommended

Sweet staff and wonderful service . Hoan was my massage and she was very kind. The place is very clean and everyone greets with a smile. Definitely recommending this place and Hoan for a friendly relaxation

Mido Hanoi Spa x 2 - 11A Hang Be Street. Outstanding customer service from both outlets. This one had renovations happening nearby so they called and payed for a taxi to their other spa in Hang Be street. Great presentation, exceptionally clean and perfect service and massage. They even babysat our 8yo Daughter why my wife and I had our massages, she also had a pedi $60AUD for 2 x 1 hour massages and a pedicure for the little baby! More than worth it.

Amazing customer service and massage . We attended the location near our hotel but we were then redirected to their secondary location on hang be street. The spa called ahead, booked our massages and paid for the taxi to the second location because in the first spa there was construction noise! That was exceptional...and it just got better after we arrived! We had a family room and our daughter had a pedicure while my husband and I both had a massage. Clean, quiet, professional and amazing massage! Highly recommend! Australian $60 for 2x 1 hour massages and a pedicure. Don't go to a cheaper spa...the service and cleanliness will be compromised!

The best facial I've ever had. I get facials pretty regularly and can positively say that the "basic" facial is far from basic and is the best one I've ever had. The steps and techniques were top notch, the mask was great and my face feels so smooth, clean and refreshed. I strongly recommend it!!!!

Good service & massage. We went thrice to mido sapa during our stay in Hanoi. Reason being we really love the quality of service they provide. Overall, the environment was really comfortable and soothing, unlike other massage shops in sapa. I've tried foot spa, warm stone foot massage & full body oil massage. Personally i think warm stone foot massage was the best! Thanks Bean for being such a friendly guy and attended to us real well. Kudos!!

Fair and comfortable . The environment is nice!! Good location in old quarter. I had a 60mins foot massage. It was comfortable and satisfied. A little bit overpriced I think. But the price still cheap comparing with other countries.

Swedish Massage. The people that welcome you as soon as you enter the spa are very friendly. You can take your time to choose whatever you want whilst drinking tea. The spa's interior is beautiful with a lovely scent.The massage was exactly as described on the internet and really relaxing. The only negative thing were workers next to the building, so it was a little bit too noisey (this is only temporary). In the room it was a little bit cold.All in all it was a great experience I can really recommend, because you really get out of the traffic and all the noise for a couple of minutes. What you get is an excellent massage from friendly people.

Swedish Massage 60 minutes. Very very friendly personell and very good service. The massage was relaxing and you could hear almost no street noise. The only negative comment that can be given is that there was a construction site nearby, which was a little noisy sometimes. Obviously, that is not the fault of the Spa and is only a temporary issue.

Message is very good. We take body and foot message. Comfortable and friendly. Environment is also quiet and peaceful。. Message is very good. We take body and foot message. Comfortable and friendly. Environment is also quiet and peaceful。很棒的spa店，试了精油按摩和脚底按摩，很舒服，技师手法不错！附近还有很棒的法餐 Green Tangerine，刚好吃完来做按摩。按好了可以去附近逛逛

Impressed . One of the best Thai massages I have had. Therapist was Hoan - professional, skilled in technique, right around of strength and pressure. The spa was clean and well-managed. Even gave me a small raincoat when I left, as it had started to rain.
Outstanding . The massage was so perfect that I slept on the middle . It was so relaxing.Thank you Tong . You are the best

It was OK.. It was OK. It smelled good and was clean. But the massage wasn't as good as the foot massage we had earlier in the day for half the cost at another location. My wife and I had a private room. She received a full body aroma therapy and stated it was good. I did the foot massage and was thinking the entire time that I paid more for this one than the one I got earlier. It was good....but with a rating of 4.5 stars I expected something great...and maybe that was the issue...I had high expectations.

Four hours of bliss. My fiance and I went here for a massage, facial, pedi and mani. The service was great from the moment we walked in, and continued all the way through the process. We were served by Ms. Oanh and Ms. Ngoc, both who provided exceptional service. The massage and facial were both absolutely amazing, among the best I have received anywhere in the world.
Perfect! . Fantastic massage which was needed after long journey. No reservation needed Great little escape from the hustle and bustle of the busy streetsThanks Hoan

Superb massage & great service and quality . I have been to this place four times in the last couple of months and I think it's the best place in Hanoi. I have visited other spa places too but this one is the only one I want to visit again and again. I love the atmosphere, friendliness and professionalism of the stuff, and all the massages I have tried so far were amazing. My favourite one was the Indian deep back, shoulder and head massage, by Ms. Loan who worked magic on my back as I felt like I could fly after it. I can't thank her enough! My backache was gone in no time! I will definitely recommend this place to my friends and will be back to try other programs too. The variety of the latter is great too. Great place & great value!

What a wonderful experience . We had a great time at this spa - Very clean and friendly. We both decided on a traditional Vietnamese massage, and we were both pleased. Would highly recommend (and I may be back during my visit!!).

Great value and blissful pampering - a great way to spend a calming afternoon.. We visited this spa on our last day in Hanoi after a recommendation from hotel staff, and moments later a free taxi arrived to take us to the spa. Very friendly staff - we were told straight away that building work was being carried out next door and we could be taken to their sister spa if we wished. We opted to stay put. For approx £50 each we received 5 hours of pampering. A steam bath, followed by Indian massage, hot stone massage, salt skin rub, moisturising and a relaxing facial. Afterwards - a meal was ready for us to enjoy before leaving.Note - there are a lot of stairs involved! I have very creaky knees and hips and the multiple flights of stairs to get to room may be a problem for some. Also - be warned - the paper pants provided are mighty small, be prepared for hilarity and mortification, and perhaps take your own if anything over a size 12 :)

Friendly and quality massage. Our therapists thanh(1) and khuyen were really friendly and had excellent massage skills. We tried thai massage and vietnamese massage. Mido spa even offer us transportation to our next destination after our massage. Will go back again if i come back to hanoi.

Very Relaxing - Highly Recommend. My partner and I had a 60 min massage in the same room. This place was clean, service was great and importantly the massage was brilliant (thanks Tong). As expected you get a box with a key you keep to put all of your clothes and valuables. The box and key stay with you during the massage. It always felt safe.Also, no one hassles you for a tip at the end of the massage.Highly recommend!

Average. Somewhere better . We went there for a 90 mins massage. We 3 girls all have same treatment, however the procedure was obviously different, one of us gets very little massage on the arm and one of us did of have the stretch at the end. We came out with mix reviews and all agreed it's only average. I overall felt the staff was lack of training and I have been to much better massage places in Vietnam with similar price.
Fantastic massage and incredible service! . Had a really awesome massage here! They were so kind and attentive, and I definitely will come back here again when I'm back in Hanoi! Highly recommend-

Fully recommended . When I was on vacation in Vietnam I went here two times. Had a good first experience and that's why I came back for the second time. The staff is friendly and of course the massage was perfect. Did the Aromatherapy and the Warm stone massage, both were perfect. If you just want to get some rest for you whole body and relax a bit I would take the Aromatherapy massage, but if you want to target your muscles a bit better I would definitely try the Warm stone massage. Overall it was perfect and I will definitely come back when I'm in Vietnam.

Could be great, could be average. The reality is that Thailand is the place to get a massage. That's not to say there aren't talented Vietnamese masseuses, but you're more likely to get disappointed if you have set high expectations. the massages between 3 adult travelers were enjoyable, and probably worth the 15 - 20 dollar per hour, but not exactly top shelf or even high shelf experiences. Definitely try it out if you rarely get massages or if you need some vacation time to spare in the area. You surely won't be negatively affected. But it's a gamble for getting a extraordinary treatment.
Great!. We had an amazing massage by Vy and Loan. Ask for them if you can. Great place and great massage in a good price!
Cheap, good quality, and clean place. I had 30 min of foot masasge (around 8USD). The room is well equipped with machine-chair and clean! The quality of masasge was also nice.

Excellent use of a rainy day. Due to Typhoon weather in Hanoi, we were looking for a way to fill in our day. We chose to have an hour massage and the foot massage. The two ladies were VERY lovely, and charming. The massages were so relaxing; the best massage I've ever had. The ladies also did our nails and were very funny and kind.Due to the rain, we could not get a taxi, so the owner drove us back to our hotel in his private car. This was SO thoughtful, and we appreciated this a lot. A very friendly and relaxing place. Best in Hanoi.

Hang Be Str Location - Excellent. We went to the Hang Be Street location both times. It's in a great place for some shopping and walking around the Old Quarter before or after. My husband and I went 2x's on our trip. I was lucky enough to get the same massuese both times (Ms. Nga) who was excellent. My husband had Ms. Hien the first time and loved her and was extremely reluctant due to other bad massages in Vietnam but Ms. Loan was just as good Ms. Hien. We were so happy. We booked the Mido Special massage for 90 minutes both times in a private room. Few notes: Make sure you request the private room.**This not one of these massages that is meant to put you too sleep with light touches. You will be stretched and thoroughly massaged. Any aching muscle will be completely fixed when you leave. Both therapists asked numerous times about the pressure but they were always right on. It's like they have a sixth sense for areas that are more tense and need deeper pressure and areas that were sore would get lighter pressure.Absolutely Phenomenal! Thank you!
Amazing massage!!!. Got an excellent traditional Thai massage from Loan Nguyèt! The place was really clean and price was totally reasonable. Can't wait to go back!

Good service. I had a really nice facial at mido spa. The rooms are lovely and well decorated. It's a little pricier than other salons but you are paying for the private rooms and small details such as fruit tea before and after your treatment. The only downside was that they were very busy and I was left on my own a few times during my treatment while my therapist attended to other matters

wonderful experience. It was a wonderful experience having a massage at Mido Spa. The staff are very friendly and polite...and the massage was well worth the money. It wasn't too expensive and the therapists really took their time to provide a relaxing and comfortable massage expensive. Totally recommend going to Mido Spa after much walking around Hanoi!

Relaxed. We happened upon this place by accident but had read positive comments on trip advisor. After a number of days walking around Ho Chi Minh and Hanoi, this was a welcome oasis. I chose the hot stone foot massage, 80mins. A relaxing room and foot wash was followed by a great massage. My therapist Ms Hoon was brilliant, checking pressure was ok and that I was comfortable. She did this through the massage and ensured I was having a relaxing time. Delightful experience and would recommend the hot stones for aching legs! Treated to Sweet cold tea on arrival and drink afterwards. Great hostess at the front desk too.
Foot massage. . After walking endless miles every day this completely hit the spot. Message was super relaxing and so so amazing! Ms loan was amazing. Thank you for the wonderful experience

Wonderful. This was a treat! I went here for one of the package deals with steambath, Thai oil massage, salt scrub and facial.. The girl Ngoc really made me relax and felt like a new person after.. The place is clean and staff is friendly..

Magnificent service. I went to Mido Spa today and to say that everything was stellar is an understatement. You are greeted with a smile at the door, given comfortable sandals and are allowed time to view the price list without feeling pressured. I picked a facial and massage and they offered me a 5% discount. Hai was at my service for my facial and shiatsu massage. I asked her to be strong and she applied the right amount of pressure all over my body. The facial was also thorough and amazing. Upon leaving my skin was clean and moisturized. I highly recommend Hai at Mido spa for your relaxation and beauty needs.

Average massage. We chose the 75 min Mido massage that offers 4 massage techniques in one service. Thai and viet massage technique was good, but the other two was really unimpressive, had to ask twice to use stronger pressure, and still was just very light touches..... Rooms were also not as clean, the towels on the massage bed had a moldy smell.

Quite good . I had a sports while the wife had a scrub and foot paint. They made us fill in forms about the massage before you go in. This seems great as you are telling them what you want to focus on. The problem was I think my masseur didn't read it at all. I told her numerous times to focus on my left foot bit she didn't give it much special attention. However she did give my problem shoulders a good massage. Very professional appearance but a little experience compare to Cambodia or South Vietnam. I think we paid about 750,000 dong for 60 mins each. Then again you pay for what you get.

Fantastic sport massage. I've been here with my boy-friend and we had a Fantastic relaxing Experience: mr tuan and ms thang 1 were fully dedicated to us for 60Minute.We enjoy a lot the time spent with them. Mido spa is a place were you can find very kind staff, clean place, high quality of service at low price ...Higly recommended

Awesome. Got a foot/leg massage from the most lovely girl who's name I unfortunately can't remember - a very relaxing and satisfying 30 minutes. She asked a few times how I felt which is always great. Also the tea before and after was lovely too :-) Construction was very lightly audible in the background but more than tolerable. Overall very good.

Relaxing and affordable massages!. I went to Midori Spa three times during my week stay in Hanoi. I got two Swedish Massages, a foot scrub and rub, and a mini facial. All of the services were wonderful! Multiple times I saw the same therapist, Miss Oanh, who was fantastic! I enjoyed my time at the spa. I found it through Trip Advisor from other reviews that recommended Midori, I would highly recommend it to anyone! It is much more affordable than similar places and employs therapists with visual problems.

Friendly but not hygienic . We took a massage and a pedicure. Staff was very friendly and attentive but place was not hygienic: towels on massage beds were not replaced between customers, toilet was not too clean and pedicure utensils were not clean and passed theraspists during the treatment, towels of pedicure chsirs were filthy. One of us was injured during pedicure. The staff was very appologetic and kindly immediately offered to wave tge charge.
Excellent. The Massage was excellent. Thank you so much Ms. Hoai who gave me Mido Massage. I can highly recommend this spa salon . Ms. Hoai was very professional and very friendly.

Very professional and kind. The staff makes you feel very welcome. They are very polite and concerned with your experience.The massage was one of the best we ever had (Vietnamese massage) and prices are more then fare. We will definitely come back before we leave Vietnam.
Great spot for a quick beauty fix. Convenient location. Friendly and efficient service. I had a pedicure and wax with Ms Hai. She was very attentive. The sweetest!
Great massage. We visit with the family 4 persons and get the swedish massage from one hour and it was a very good massage!

Very welcoming staff and good massage. I went to Mido Spa after reading the reviews in TripAdvisor, and it didn´t disappoint me.The girl in the reception was just lovely, with such a soothing voice that made my whole body relax. She received me with a beautiful Vietnamese tea and explained me a bit more about their treatments. I finally chose the 90´ Thai massage (started with the 75' one, but changed my mind after the first 15', and decided I wanted to extend it), and met Ms. Phuong, who was going to be my massage therapist. She doesn´t speak much english, but basic communication worked well. She´s a very skilled professional, strong, athletic, and effective. The bed was very comfy, and the room was dark and with a nice warm temperature. All ready to relax.I'd definitely go back if I come to Hanoi again.

Great relaxing time!. We just had a nice experience at the Spa. I got a foot massage and my partner got a facial. Both Quang Anh and Than were very professional and friendly. Thank you!Handy location, very clean and welcoming. Much nicer the others we walked past. Would recommend and go again!

Best Spa in Hanoi. Been to a few spas in Hanoi and found that this is the best one out. It is slightly more expensive than others however it is great quality! Dark rooms to add to the relaxation. Wonderful staff and clean! Must try!

Ultimate relaxed. I had a very very nice Vietnamese massage from ms. Hien. Just what I needed after a long travel. There was noise in the hotel next to it because of constructions or something, but during massage it didnt botter me at all. Great one!

Good massage for reasonable price. I went there due to the good reviews on Trip advisor and was not disappointed. The staff is really friendly and professional and during ashort waiting time (i was too early for my appointment) i was treated with tea and sweets. I got a aroma therapie massage (Ms Khuyen did a great job!) which was very good. The facilities are very clean as well.

Lovely Relaxing massage. My boyfriend and I went for a couples massage. It was a really lovely experience. The therapists were experienced and asked about injuries, my boyfriend has an injury and they made sure he was fully comfortable and worked around it.Would definitely recommend a visit.

Lovely Mani/Pedi with Phanh. My friend and I had booked back to back overnight trains coming from Sapa and going onto Hoi An. We had 18hrs in Hanoi and felt pretty grimy. We went to Mido spa and I got a mani/pedi and my friend had a facial. My experience under the care of Phanh was delightful! She did a lovely job with my nails and made me feel oodles better. Thanks so much Mido for a great experience!
Wow!. Recommend by the hotel. And what an amazing experience! Chose the foot massage and I got much more than I expected. Highly recommended and worth every penny
Gd massage!!!. Vet gd massage after a LONG day walk!!! The price is a bargain compare with the quality u could get!!The girls there is attentive and nice too! Will definitely go again next time.
Facial& Indian massage . Great service! Loved the massage and facial. They have private rooms of three beds so if you go in a small group it'd be perfect. Would definitely recommend and go back!
Very relaxing! . We visited after a long day of exploring Hanoi. We had an Indian back & shoulder massage which was enjoyed by all! Definitely worth a visit!

Great foot scrub by Nguyet. Visited Mido Spa in the evening since it was a stone's throw from our hotel - probably one of the best decisions we've made this trip! We decided to go a bit more unconventional than the normal foot and hand massage and opted for a foot scrub. Nguyet (my masseuse) was absolutely wonderful, she was very thorough with every part of the massage and I had an amazing 75 minutes. Couldn't have asked for better service by the rest of the staff as well. We'll be back (tomorrow)!

Wow that was an amazing massage!. One of the best foot massages I've had in ages. An amazing respite and thoroughly deserving reward after a long day's worth of walking and exploring Hanoi. The masseuse Hoan was very friendly, consistently aware if the foot massage was painful at certain points. I never expect a massage to be completely pain free, after all, no pain no gain! But what was impressive was that Hoan was very aware if I even twitched slightly, asking if a certain massage was too painful or not. Truly great service! Extremely comfortable, felt like I had a new set of feet by the end of it. Even provided refreshing drinks before and after the massage! Each 60 minute foot massage is 290 VND, and 400 VND for a 75 minute foot spa that includes a scraping of the feet plus scrub, which has certainly left my feet smooth as ever. Would strongly recommend this massage place for anyone looking to treat themselves to an hour of amazing relaxation after a long day walking around humid Hanoi!

Great Massage after a long trek. I had a 75 minutes massage with Hien. What to say, the experience was just incredible. I opted for a traditional Thai massage (one of my favourites) and came out as a new man.I am not sure why some people would give this place less than 4 or 5 stars. The staff was quite professional and friendly. Of course, there is a bit of a language barrier as only a few people speak English, but that will definitely not change the experience at all!The price also seemed to be quite reasonable given the great atmosphere and cleanliness.I would definitely recommend this SPA!I really look forward to come back to Mido after my Trekking in SAPA!

Great spa. I came here to remove gel nails and get a pedicure. I experienced lovely service from a lady who didn't speak English, but smiled all the way through! The gel didn't completely come off my nails, but I left the salon with much better nails than when I went in! My toes looked gorgeous and my feet were completely taken care of! A lovely salon with fair priced services. I appreciated the drink after the service as well as the wifi in the reception. I will visit again if I return to Hanoi.

Just excellent!!. We just showed up around 9pm, and they had a room for us straight away- we did a couples massage- there are many many different options. Couldn't recommend this place enough. The masseuses were fantastic, the place was spotless, and it felt like such a luxury experience with small details like the foot bath, the tea in the seating area before and after the treatment, and the flowers everywhere. Great value for money.

Amazing treatment and very relaxing!. After traveling Southeast Asia for 3 weeks I decided to treat myself towards the end of my trip in Hanoi. I'm glad I decided on Mido spa. I went all out and choose the Dream Five Nectar package which included a steam bath, massage, wrap and fruit facial. It was perfect after getting so much sun. The cost was only about $50 usd for over 3 hours! My skin has never felt so soft. I would recommend going after 11am as there is construction at the hotel next door in the morning, but it stops after 11am. My masseuse was wonderful and very professional and the receptionist was helpful and spoke great English.

Calming and friendly staff. Was well greeted upon arrival and the staff were gentle during massage . Would definitely come back again 10/10. If you are living at the hoan kiem district it is just a walking distance

Everyone is so lovely!. Love this place - so much I went there 3 separate times in my 5-day trip! Did the regular facial, regular mani/pedi, and body massage. Each time, the managers and the masseuse/nail/facial ladies were all different, but they all did a great job with great attitude. I highly recommend it!

A wonderful calm oasis amongst the chaos. I popped into the spa on a whim after a day of walking around Hanoi and becoming pretty exhausted and flustered. The spa is so nice and relaxing as soon as you enter. I didn't have a reservation but I only had to wait about 5 minutes before being whisked away to a room. I got a facial and aromatherapy massage by Nguyet and Tham who were wonderful. Definitely worth a stop to refresh.

Excellent Spa!. My boyfriend and I visited Mido and got the full spa foot treatment. From the moment we walked in the staff was warm and welcoming, and also brought us some delicious complementary tea while we waited for them to set up our room. The foot treatment itself was long and relaxing, with the staff being extremely friendly and sincere. It also included a light hand and back massage, which we were not expecting to come with the foot package. Overall a great experience!

Amazing spa, wonderful service, questionable staff. I got a Thai Massage under a package alongside basic facial care, salt body scrub, and a light steam sauna start off. Overall was a wonderful massage and I felt very relaxed afterwards. The greeting and overall service was very welcoming and attentive. However, the one negative experience I got out of this was that the staff were constantly gossiping about my girlfriend and me. We are both fluent in Vietnamese and were fully aware of what they were saying. Being a masseuse and constantly working with different bodies one would expect them to be professional, but throughout the massage (despite it being good) they were constantly talking to each other calling me fat and unfit. This made me very uncomfortable and will result in me probably never going back to this spa again, I highly recommend fixing the issue, because otherwise was great service.
Great spa . Professional personel, great atmosphere and best of all grear massages! Can (and will) recommend it to other weary travellers - the foot massage was wonderful after a week of backpacking!
Excellent . Very good. Nice massages (we got a facial and a foot massage). Very (!!) friendly staff. And all for a cheap price.

Amazing Swedish massage . My boyfriend and I decided to get a massage here after reading the reviews and it did not disappoint. We both had Swedish massages from Quang Anh and Nguyet and both felt very relaxed after! The staff were very professional and the receptionist was very friendly, definitely recommend!

Great Massage. My wife and I went here and booked in for a foot massage. The staff were excellent from the get go, and offered to transfer us to a separate location as there were construction works happening near by. The actual massage was brilliant, and both my wife and I felt amazing afterwards.
Great foot massage!. Enjoyed an hour long foot and leg massage at Mido Spa and was very impressed with the service and professionalism!Clean, comfortable and transparent pricing - highly recommend!

Lovely. My friend and I went to get our nails done,we came across the spa on a walk round the old district,it is lovely inside the staff are all very attentive and so nice to chat to!Ngog and Phuong were the ladies that did our nails,such a good price for the quality aswell!Will definitely be returning before we go home

Good spa. We went here 2x and both times enjoyed it very much. The 2nd time I'd say that the massage wasn't as good as the first time and unfortunately they had missed our advance booking, however our two masseuses (one of which was Anh 1) were great.

We will come back!. My husband and I live in Hanoi and we love to go for massage on a regular basis. We try Mido for the first time last weekend and we just walked in. We had a beautiful room for 2 in 5 min! They speak very well English at the front desk. We choose a 90min Aromatherapy massage which was done by "Phuong and Nguyet" (I highly recommend them, they are very professional and have great technique). Our only disappointing point is that they have construction in the Hotel next door and we have to hear the drilling (very loud) during our entire massage. If we would have been made aware of this big detail in advance, we would have gone to the other location, but unfortunately, no one told us :( so this is the only let down. We will return again in the near future.

Feeling relaxed in Hanoi!. My girlfriend and I stumbled across Mido Spa whilst walking in the Old Quarter looking for somewhere to have a massage. We had been travelling all day from Seoul and were feeling pretty sore after walking around and enjoy what the city offers (first impressions are very good). The service we received was the best I have experienced. Apparently I fell asleep I was so relaxed! We both went for the 1 hour Thai massage with Thuy and Nguyet who were really amazing and made us very comfortable. We will definitely be coming back here again. The staff here are so friendly and chatty and the relaxing water feature tops of the experience. If you're in Hanoi. Go treat yourself.
Full body massage . Very good, quite good English speaking receptionist and friend environment. Full body massage, traditional Thai for 60mins for 20usd. Good deal and with good music.
super relaxing. I went to Mido as it was close to my hotel. The staff were very friendly and the massage was one of the best I have had.

Best massage ever!. My girlfriend and I went to Mido Spa for a massage on our last day in Vietnam.After a couple of crazy weeks travelling around northern Vietnam, we wanted to relax before coming back home and were really pleased with the treatment received.I won't say it was the best massage I ever had (yes, I know that's what it says in the review title..) as I can't remember every massage I had in my life and I don't like lying.. but it is definitely in the top 5
spa pedi. we walked in without an appointment and only had to wait 5 min. the spa pedi was wonderful. I had Thanh 2 and she did an amazing job! going back to her tomorrow for a facial

Great massages. My wife and I decided to try Mido at their Hang Be location given the great reviews on Tripadvisor as the top rated spa. I believe the high ratings are justified. They are quite professional and accommodating and fit us in despite us misbooking an appointment time.Our massage therapists were Nga and Linh. They were excellent and always checked if the pressure was too much. I had the Mido special over (gasp) 2 hours and it was awesome. I was very relaxed afterwards.Many thanks!

Best massage in hanoi. Friendly staff, nice atmosphere, good price and amazing massage. Ask for phanh (1) she was very good ( there are two therapists called phanh). Mido is the number one in trip advisor for a Reason! There are also 3 branches in hanoi all part of the same business so not fake massage parlours just using the mido name.
Super friendly!. Very nice constellation with super friendly staff! Me and my girlfriend went there and we were both satisfied with our treatments

Pro massage . Very good, I went to the Mido Spa for a steam, massage and facial treatment. Was very happy and would definitely attend again. English isn't there strong point but great massage non the less. 5 star.

Pampering heaven . I've been here three times during my stay in Hanoi; the first was the best massage I've ever had by Ba; the second was a much needed spa manicure and pedicure; and the third I splurged on the Paradise Package which was 5.25 hours of utter heaven. Very friendly and attentive staff, clean, great location and all for such a great price. Would definitely recommend to any traveller!
Excellent massage!. I had a fantastic relaxing foot massage here today. My therapist was friendly and super polite. My feet feel like a million bucks after all the walking around I've done in Hanoi.

Phuong was Excellent !. I am overly impressed by the standard of this Spa. From the moment you enter the premise they are attentive and cater to your every need. Their staff offer high quality service in a professional environment. From the moment you enter there is a sense of serenity. I would highly recommend this Spa. My facial was superb.

Relaxing end to abusiness trip!. The spa is located at the heart of the busy Old Quarter in Hanoi. Once you enter, you will be greeted by a very pleasant lady receptionist who will explain to you the services they offer in a well presented menu.My wife and I chose the 2-hour Mido Special Massage where the masseur used a combination of different techniques - Thai, Shiatsu, Aroma and Sports massage. The whole package relaxes every bit of your body without putting tension to your body even if you requested for a hard massage. It was a bliss! To top it off, we had manicure and pedicure and it was quite a treat for our nails, they felt refreshed too!It was overall a wonderful experience on a reasonable price and tranquil atmosphere!

New Spa in Hang Be Street- wonderful. I was so impressed by the service at this new day spa. Staff are attentive, sweet and friendly. I walked in off the street for a foot massage on my first night in Hanoi and booked a full package for the next day. I had waxing done and the coconut package (highly recommended) with a milk bath, massage, body scrub and facial. I was so relaxed I fell asleep!I came in at 3pm and the staff took my dinner order and brought in delicious pho. I felt so pampered!Great value for money and free wifi.

Great place to relax. We booked a massage at this place as it was close by to where we were staying. Relaxing atmosphere, clean and the massage itself was good. I had the Swedish massage, it wasn't very deep or painful, but I felt relaxed and calm afterwards. Would definitely recommend this place!

Not an expert in foot massages! . A group of 3, we went for an hour foot massage that was quoted to us @ 200K (sgd 12.50) dong per pax. Original price was written as 300K dongThe masseuse had good strength, however they could not catch the correct pressure points. It was a pity, they may not be an expert in foot massages but may be better in body massages. For additional information, an hour of swedish massage was quoted @ 280K per pax (menu was at 460K dong)

Great Experience. I visited this business as it is only around the corner from where i was staying. I was greeted by friendly staff who provided the options.Hoan provided a great massage experience with some techniques i have never exeprienced before.She was hard and firm in some places which i liked.Great experience, thanks Hoan

Soothing and relaxing. A very soothing and relaxing no non-sense professional massage. We were offered a 30% discount instantly. The masseurs will ask you frequently the kind of pressures on the body that you can endure, and will massage accordingly. Neat and clean rooms and a very nice atiso tea is served at the end. With various kinds of massages available in Hanoi, I will definitely recommend this one to anyone blindly. Truly amazing!

Great spa and friendly staff. Mido Spa offers a fantastic assortment of services. From foot massages to facials, you truly can make this experience your own. The staff is unbelievably accommodating and friendly. We had Tong and Nguyet Anh. For two foot massages, it costs only $25 and is well worth it.

10/10 will definitely come back. Walking around hot Hanoi and looking for a cool, nice smelling oasis? Could not have asked for a better foot massage, not to mention they also massaged my arms, shoulders, and back. The staff were very friendly, and this is overall a great pick:)

Best aromatherapy massage . I was concerned about how strong massages would be in vietnam compared with australia. This massage was by far the best i have had in a while. The staff were very friendly and accomdating. The massage was amazing.. the only issue i had was the noise from construction site next door but they did warn me and gave me 10% off at the end due to the little noise. Would definitely recommend this place.

Nice, inexpensive massage. My family of four (two adults, two teens) went here based on TA reviews. They were very prompt in working us all in. We each had a 75 minute Swedish massage. The only downside that I can find is that there was some chatter between therapists (we were all in the same room) and a little traffic noise from outside. Otherwise, it was perfect! Price (including tip) was just under $100usd for all four of us.

Not recommend . This was definitely not what we were expecting when we saw the ratings. We were wanting to get pedicures but opted to just get our nails painted once we saw the place, as we were concerned about the cleanliness of tools. The women were very nice but there was a very limited color selection and the paint lasted less than 12 hours. I guess it depends on what you're looking for but we definitely wouldn't do it again. We are accustomed to pedicures in the US so while we understood it would be different, it was definitely not a relaxing or enjoyable experience.

Good spa. Visited Mido on last day of trip, emailed them a day before for the questions I had and they responded fast. Request male masseur and private room as I don't like to share the room, they can arrange for me. Masseur's skill was good and I feel relax, nearly even fall asleep, lol.Good price and definitely visit again next time.

Fabulous Massage. Just had a great Thai Massage with Phuong. She was excellent and caring, making sure she wasn't too strong or anything was hurting. Will hopefully make this a weekly visit over the next few months!

A great hot stone massage ever!. I had a 90 mins hot stone full body massage by Tuat and he did a fantastic job especially on my neck and shoulder. The room is very clean and huge. I have had several similar massage before but this one beats them all! Thanks to you, Tuat for an excellent job well done! The only "complaint" is that I had to climb up 3 or 4 floors to get to the massage room. I will definitely come back again on my next trip to Hanoi. Highly recommended.

Treat yourself, its worth it. Had a great full body massage here after a long day of walking. The staff were very welcoming and professional. The facililties were clean and well presented - you may have to walk up a number of flights of stairs however to get to the treatment rooms. I am not sure if there is a lift. Would come back

I was kind of expecting more from the spa considering the price I paid - it was good but not the best.. There is definitely room for improvement. Although may not look like a 5-star ambience upstairs (there are a few floors), yet they kept it clean! So, it is a bonus point! Do negotiate for the price, if you can. They do give discounts from their menu. And, take note that they may have 2 different price tiers for their services.

Basic facial and foot massage. My husband and I went here and I had a fabulous facial by Tham, that included head, neck and arm massage. I was comfortable the whole time and Tham did everything to make my experience nice. My skin felt great afterwards. My husband had a foot massage from Tam in the same room at the same time. We have had several lovely foot massages on our trips, he reports that this on was the best he had ever had. He also received a leg, shoulder and back massage. We only wish we had found this spa earlier in our trip as we would have returned!
Good service. Me and my girlfriend tried Sport massage and we all have good experience. Friendly and helpfull staff. Highly recommend. But you guys should change the address to Hàng Bè Street.

Amazing experience. Incredibly clean environment and friendly staff. The owner of the spa voluntarily took me back to the hotel I was staying at after closing the shop. I did Thai massage and the masseur Tan did an amazing job stretching and distressing. 90 min was 670k vnd. Will come back again for sure.

Ultimate relaxation - great service. This spa is right next door to my hotel so I decided to check it out. I was immediately greeted by the friendly staff and placed in a seat with tea to select which massage out of their very comprehensive pamphlet - all in english. Prices are very reasonable. I had the swedish massage for 75 minutes and Hoan was very lovely, and very strong! Do not underestimate these women! I feel great, I would highly recommend this place.
Excellent spa in Old Quater. I visited this spa with a friendWe both had a back massage, amazing service and staffHighly recommend and we plan to visit again
Wow! . Great place, we loved it! Had a thai massage and a herbal traditional massage plus pedicure and manicure and waxing. Will be back for more.

Amazing Massage. Went with a friend and we both got the Indian back, neck and shoulder massage and a spa pedicure. No appointment needed, we just walked in. The massage was amazing, Thank you Ms. Thanh 2. Good value and would recommend.

Excellent price-Excellent service. Lovely relaxing spa in the Old Quarter. Well priced. My husband had a back massage, and I had a foot massage both were perfect. The spa is clean and calm and the staff are friendly.

Best Ever. My man and myself have been here twice .First time we both had massages.Me i had the Hot Stone massage and him the Swedish one..wow...have just gone back again after 3 days. This time i had the Foot Treatment and him another Swedish massage. ..We both came out both times saying "OMG". Seriously this Spa is the BEST...its a must do on your travels. Very professional

Absolutely loved our experience here!. During our stay in Hanoi we visited Mido Spa 3 times and we enjoyed it very much.The staff: Hoai and Tam are very pleasant and provide very nice foot and body massage. It was so good we all dozed off.Lots of tea and drinks offered and very comfy treatment rooms! They offer several style of massage at very reasonable prices.We would definitely go there if were to ever be in Hanoi again and we hope other people will try this out as well.
Very nice spa, clean, friendly!. Spent over two hours there with a friend. Massage is good value, and worth it. Mani and pedis done. Going back before we leave.

Great massage, went twice. The staff were very nice. We did two massages, aromatherapy and thai massage. I really enjoyed the stretching that came with the thai massage.Hot tip: Ask the hostess what level of strength each massage is. We heard an older Korean lady yelp after she didn't quite expect her massage to be so strong. But my first massage was too weak, so on the second I asked for which one would be stronger.

Scrub with massage the best . Never have I felt like this in my life. Spoilt for a great price. The girls were professional. Knew what they were doing, and kind. Really recommend the Scrub. Get a massage afterwards, thank me later!

Average Massage and poor manicure. Staffs were friendly but massage therapists did not delivery a professional massage technique to us. My husband and I been to different places for massage and we think the massage sequence and average time spending to different parts of the body are very important. I also had the Spa treatment of manicure, it was even worse that she did not know how to clip my cuticle.

Fab foot treatment. Just had a foot treatment at this spa (80 minutes for scrub, massage and paraffin wax treatment for 400k dong) would highly recommend, v professional and relaxing and my feet now feel fantastically soft after a 5 weeks traveling around Vietnam.
Great massage. Well worth a visit. Wished had found it at the start, could have got two visits in before we left. Very clean and tidy premises. Highly recommend.

Impeccable!!. Staff are extremely professional and very friendly. Everything is clean and quite up to date. I had a coffee body scrub, facial and a spa pedicure. All i am over the moon with every aspect of my visits here and would highly recommend to everyone. Thank you!!

Excellent Thai Massage and Spa Package. Very professional and pleasant.
Good value, great setting, friendly staff.
Very good coconut spa package, lots of napping!
Excellent. I had the first package with a sauna shower, massage and facial. It was blissfully relaxing and I would definitely recommend this spa.

By far the Best. I had a very specific request about Thai stretch massage without any oil. And boy o boy what an awesome massage I got. One of the very best so far for me. Thanks for such an awesome massage.

Relaxing experience after a long day. I would definitely recommend this spa for travelers in Hanoi who are looking for a relaxing experience. The spa offers a whole variety of services, well price, the place is very clean and professional and courteous staff.

Relaxing... This was recommended by my hotel and no regrets coming to this spa! I had the 90 minutes Vietnamese massage and it was very relaxing. Ngoc did the massage for me and I really enjoyed it. 😊 She was very nice and friendly and really good masseur. Will definitely recommend to my friends!

An OK Spa on the way out of town. I'd read that the "spa" concept is still a rather new thing in Vietnam, so I was understanding that this wasn't going to be a super luxe experience. It was good - my husband and I each got a Swedish massage and I got a spa mani/pedi before we left for the airport and it perfectly suited our needs. A nice relaxing way to wrap up a busy weekend in Hanoi.
Very good 👍. Very comfortable Really relaxing . Staff are friendly , enthusiastic and very attentive. Very, very good
Fantastic. Perfect thing after a day in the city extremely friendly and great service! I'd come back again in a heartbeat

Please don't get your eyebrows waxed here.... I really wanted to like this place because the people are very sweet. The minute I walked inside, I was greeted by a young man and shown a menu. As I sat looking over the menu, a young woman brought me some lukewarm tea *not sure if it was meant to be at this temperature but whatever*. I decided on an eyebrow wax *the reason I came* and a swedish massage because with their prices... how could you not?Well..first, do NOT expect luxury from this place. This is not one of those hidden gems where you wonder how they afford to keep their treatments at such a low cost... you pay for what you get here. It is cheap and it feels cheap. I was brought upstairs to the 3rd and entered a large room with 6 or so massage tables. I was told to go to the furthest table which was closest to the opposite wall and right under the air conditioning. There is no barrier to each bed except for a curtain *a bit like in hospitals*. The two young girls asked me to undress which I did.. it was a bit uncomfortable because they didn't close the curtain and I ended up undressing partially in front of them which was a bit weird. Anyway, first, they "waxed" my brows. The wax was WAY too hot, I think the girls knew this was an issue because she kept blowing on it as she applied it to my skin and kept asking "it's ok?".. hey, I'm young and have experienced worse pain but it was very uncomfortable to say the least. Not ideal, especially when they got to the sensitive thin skin around the eyes. They *yes, two of them* finished my brows and immediately started my massage, odd. Usually, you're given a mirror to see the results but whatever, I'm in Vietnam so I'm gonna go with it. The massage was legitimately the WORST massage I've ever received. It felt like she was rubbing sunblock on my back more than massaging my muscles. They were very abrupt and choppy strokes. It got to the point where I was almost going to just ask her to kindly stop, I'd pay for the treatment but I didn't want it. However, all of a sudden, the massage got good. As the masseuse got closer to my shoulders, I noticed she now wore slippers and had an ankle bracelet. I'm pretty sure one woman started my massage and another women finished which again, is fine.. but odd. Then, it was time for me to turn over and that's when I realized the lights were on, not dimmed at all. So she put a towel over my eyes and told me "goodnight". That's when someone turned the air conditioning on full blast as it hit my oiled bare legs, so cold! At the end of my treatment, she told me I could get dressed but I still hadn't seen my eyebrows so I asked for a mirror. They spoke and giggled to each other then gave me one girl's phone and put it on camera but there was a weird green filter on.. I told them never mind and that I'd look on my phone. I realized looking on a camera phone is not the same so asked again if I could please look at a mirror. Finally, they gave me one and I see why they didn't want to. My eyebrows are jacked up! I'm not a vain person but wow-ee. I've never received a worse eyebrow wax. She shortened my eyebrows on both sides, and somehow gave them less shape. So they kind of look like two frownie faces. My eyebrows had grown out so she had a lot to work with. Upon closer inspection, she missed A LOT of strays, and had even taken some hair out so it looked patchy. She asked if I was "okay" and I told her "not really" as I explained what I was unhappy with. She went away for a second so I started to dress when the woman at reception walked in as I covered myself with my shirt, still in nothing but underwear. She asked me what was wrong and tried to convince me they looked good. She kept asking if I was happy so I finally gave her a "Yes, fine" so I could get dressed. As I checked out, she gave me a questionnaire on my visit and I filled it out honestly, saying I felt "average" about the visit. When it was time to pay she told me she took off my eyebrows which was very kind of her. I still gave my masseuse a tip because I feel weird not to but will definitely not be coming back. Also, please, seriously, do NOT get your eyebrows done here. it's 100k dong which is one hell of a deal but you're seriously going to get what you're paying for. Oh, not to mention, my first red flag should have been that the woman waxing my brows was the woman who gave me the massage. I feel awful leaving a bad review because they really do seem to be nice people there but I'm rating them on their work.

rough hands :(. My boyfriend and I came here, hoping for some relief in our tight caves from hiking in Ninh Binh. So we picked a 90mins swedish massage.They brought us all the way to a room on the 4th or 5th floor (argh!). The massage itself was just average. She had really rough hands so it almost felt like an exfoliation as well. There was also a lot of noise coming from the back alley, so overall, it's not that relaxing.I would not recommend this place to anyone, since the pricing is a little steep for the experience.

So not relaxing experience. The staff is very friendly there, however, in the middle of our foot massage, they suddenly turned on the light without telling us a thing. And They were cutting the nails of the new customer next to me and my boyfriend. This is the weirdest and unacceptable massage experience I have ever had. We didn't feel relaxed at all. Will never come here again!

Wonderful massage. My husband and I both enjoyed our hot stone massages. He also had a leg and foot massage and I had a foot treatment. Than 1 and Than 2 were our therapists and we found them to be professional, friendly and accomplished.

Very nice, relaxing experience. I enjoyed a 90-minute hot stones massage. I highly recommend Ngoc as your therapist. The entire experience was relaxing and peaceful. The spa is clean, nicely appointed, and quiet. Ngoc is obviously well-trained and professional.I live in Hanoi now and expect to return to the Mido and Ngoc many times.

Great massage and facial.... I went to Mido Spa without an appointment and requested a steam bath/massage/facial package. The spa staff had no problem arranging this for me, regardless of the fact that I did not book an appointment in advance. Both the massage and facial were excellent, and I am considering a second trip to Mido soon (though it is more expensive than other spas in the area). However, I do have some questions regarding the facial and mani/pedi instrument sterilization methods...How are the facial instruments sterilized? And are they sterilized after every use? I did not see any sterilization machines in the spa.This is very important to me, as there are a number of blood diseases/infections that can be spread due to improper sterilization.

Professional, clean and great massages.. My husband and I went back twice. It's great value, about 1/3 of the price of what you'd pay in Australia. The ladies are warm and welcoming and absolutely professional. First visit we were in a room on our own and the second time we heard another couple come in and be located to other beds but it was all still dark and private. That didn't bother us at all. It's not like it's 5-star pricing. Give them a go, they are so accommodating and give great massages.
Thai massage from Ngoc. Had the Thai massage, absolutely brilliant!!! Very relaxing, professional service. Highly recommend Mido Spa for a relaxing time out to rejuvenate your body.

Brilliant Thai massage by Huong. The best spa I have been to in Vietnam. Quiet, peaceful and professional. The staff attended to our every need and accommodated us without a booking. The setting is clean and relaxing. Huong was very professional and thorough with her massage and the whole experience was refreshing, I came out feeling like I wanted to go right back. You will not be disappointed.

Best massage i ever had. Just got the most amazing massage off Thanh 1, i entered the place feeling stressed and left feeling incredibly relaxed, she is a real expert, she always made me feel comfortable and never even asked for a tip in the end. I found the music very relaxing and the massage room very comfortable. All the staff were really friendly and welcoming and i would recommend this place to anyone who visits Hanoi. I think i will have to go back again in a few days and maybe for a longer visit this time. Thank you Thanh 1.

Great experience and super relaxing. Best massage ever! I found this spa on tripadvisor and the reviews speak for itself. Personal is very kind and professional. I had the Thai massage with oil, which was really good. Go and try it yourself :)

Good massage, but hoped for more. I took 60min sportmassage. It was good but i'd hoped for a bit stronger touch. Maybe longer massage would have been better. Place was clean and nice atmosphere. There was some problem with credit card payment so i payed with dollars. Same same :)

Amazingly relaxing. Me and my friends went here for a bit of relaxation. Made reservations through our hotel, so they took the six of us at the same time, and we all did swedish massages. I have rarely been so relaxed in my entire life. Clean salon, professional and friendly staff, a great place for a massage. They offered a large variety of massages.

Nice and relaxing. Went here with the wife. Reception is friendly and fluent in English. Treatments are clearly explained by the staff and executed as described. I've never been much of a massage person, but this spot was definitely enjoyable. Will send the wife here again so that she doesn't ask me to do the labor of getting her knots out.

Great Bargain. Good place to get a cheap (by US standards at least) massage, foot massage, mani, pedi, etc... Right in the old quarter, so convenient to get to by foot. Don't go expecting a luxurious, private treatment room. Visitors are separated by curtains. But it is clean, pleasant ,and the services are great.

A relaxing and serene escape from the hustle and bustle of Hanoi. My family and I were impressed with the service at Mido, particularly that of the manager. I found my shiatsu massage to be very firm and effective and would highly recommend that and the sports massage, which a family member had. We enjoyed our experience at Mido Spa so much that we came back twice. This was a real treat and it was nice to get away from the polluted hustle and bustle of Hanoi.

Best massage. Best massage I've had in Vietnam. I like my massages firm and working on the muscles & that's what I got with the sports massage. A little more expensive than others but worth it. Staff were friendly and they gave me cup of tea before & after.

Average Experience. The front desk service was good. However, we didn't expect to share the room with two other guys (there were around 5-6 beds in that room). There were curtains drawn as partitions and luckily we were allocated at the far end of the room. Me and my husband had their Mido special massage (3-in-1), but we can't really tell the difference between the different massages. It is still very relaxing and I even fell asleep. I thought it was slightly over-priced, especially after visiting Midori Spa a few days later. Apparently, they seem to share the same group of masseurs as I saw the same masseurs from Mido when we visited Midori spa (which charge at a much lower price).

The Wong Family. Have tried Thai massage in Thailand, Chinese massage in China & now to experience massage by Vietnamese therapist. I should say there are rooms to improve their professionalism. However, I should compliment to the Manager, Tan's customer service was excellent. He made sure all of us had a satisfied massage before we left. It's because of him that we went back the second time. Thanks to Tan & keep it up!

Not at all terrifying . As a touch-averse first time massagee, I was nervous going in. Especially when we got to the, "Okay, now flip over," part. And then the scalp massage started and I seriously contemplated going double or nothing with a two hour massage. Thanks, team!

Foot Massage with Hot Stones. Went in and was surprised that it was a social enterprise as our therapists were visually impaired. They did their massages fantastically well and we were pleased. Clean spa and reasonable pricing. Worth a visit.

Brilliant facial. We both had brilliant facials - so relaxing and really lovely staff - very welcoming. Excellent value.
Holly and Claire

Massage was good.. Aromatherapy massage was nice. I felt cold a little during the massage. she turned on the heater for me and kind. She didn't request tips. I think I would come here again next time.

Nice day spa!. My husband and I popped into Mido Spa based on TripAdvisor ratings and it was clean and nice. It was also very affordable at $34 USD for a 2 hour massage. This included tea service before and after.

Amazing hospitality and great prices!. I was on business in Hanoi for a few days with a group of other women--we had a friend refer us to Mido. We were worried we would not be able to schedule a whole package for five of us a day ahead, but Mido was so accommodating! We emailed them exactly what each of us wanted and they had it ready immediately. Upon our arrival we received amazing tea and candy and we were pampered from start to finish.I purchased a relaxing package-- for roughly $34 USD, I was given a thirty minute steam bath, a full body massage, a facial and a pedicure. It was extremely relaxing!I would suggest this spa to any travelers looking for an affordable day of pampering.

Amazing herbal steam and massage . Mr and my partner had a herbal steam bath when we were feeling a bit of a cold/flu and it totally cleared us up! We then had a beautiful massage with Hai Anh and Mai and we are so blinded out were heading back to our hotel for a nap!

Definitely recommended!. I went to Mido on my hotel's recommendation and was not disappointed. The ambience is relaxing, the amenities luxurious and the staff are well trained and lovely. On my first visit I enjoyed a facial treatment and spa pedicure and was so happy I went back a second time to have an intuitive shiatsu massage. Special shout out to my two gorgeous therapists Ms.Hai And Ms.Thanh 2.

An excellent massage. My wife and I had massages and treatments here over 2 days. The staff are good and friendly. The masseurs know their trade. Prices are on the high side - I expected prices much lower than Melbourne but this was not the case. Their menu of services was however extensive. I would go back here.
Really good experience with great staff. shiatsu was perfect, not too strong. Went through the entire body and provide short for people not comfortable in their underware

One of the best.... Went in for a foot scrub and massage after a couple of long days of walking all around town. Had a really awesome experience. My massuese Thuy was very thorough and professional who also did a light arm and shoulder massage as a nice little extra. Loved it...would go again!

A worthy addition to your trip in Hanoi!!. My boyfriend and I, had just finished a long trek from the Phillipines, with an overall travel duration of 12 hours. We continued our adventure in Hanoi by feet, exploring through the busy streets and happened to walk by Mido Spa. The price looked reasonable and decided our tired feet deserved a break. We were greeted immediately with a cup of tea and a service menu. Ask for Thuy and Hoan, who gave us our wonderful foot massages!!! No exaggeration, my feet were reawakened after 60 minutes! During our massages, they were really friendly and conversed with us, making us feel very comfortable. We will definitely be back!

Great couples foot massage. We came into Hanoi very late at night feeling tired from travel. Mido Spa was the only place open and they welcomed us warmly with a smile. We were given really tasty tea to sip while we got foot massages. This was the best foot massage I've ever had and they took wonderful care of us, especially to make sure we were happy and feeling good. Also, the room had a very pleasant spice aroma which wasn't too strong. We left feeling completely relaxed and ready for our first trip to Vietnam. We will go back again.

Professional and lovely spa. Me and my girlfriend came here for hot rocks massage and were not disappointed. It was the most professional massage she or I have ever had, my masseuse hanh was clearly well trained. We left feeling very relaxed.
Loved it . A bit more expensive but worth it. The staff are lovely and professional and it is super relaxing in there. I have been twice already and will go back before I leave Hanoi

best treatment i've had in Vietnam. I had the Relaxing Package (2h15min) including a steam bath, massage and facial and have to say I was not disappointed. Ok, the door to the steam bath didn't close properly so I had to hold it, but the rest was great. I had a room to myself with soft music in the background and it was the first time in Vietnam that it was actually quiet. In other places I have already experienced staff playing with their phone during a massage, or staff being sick coughing on the costumer, or staff talking to each other not even trying to be quiet. Not here! The full body massage was simply relaxing and the facial made my skin feel soft and clean.I will definitely come back!

Professional and great value. I stayed at a hotel round the corner and went to the spa on three consecutive days. I found the service thoughtful and professional, the environment decent and the pricing reasonable. I liked it that I didn't have to haggle and nobody asked me for a tip (many horror stories about tourists 'held to ransom' for a tip) - the pricing is transparent, and what you see is what you get. I would recommend this spa.

Mixed outcome.. My fiance and I walked past and noticed this spa. A friendly face greeted us while we were looking at the treatment list and so we decided to go in. I chose a foot massage with pedicure and my fiance went for a 75min hot stone massage. Usually I come away from pedicures upset as I find they are rough and they hurt when my cuticles are cut. The girl that I got was amazing. She didn't hurt me at all! The massage was great, and I came away extremely happy. The hot stone massage, I am told, was great. And He came away trying to convince me that I should get one! Unfortunately, when we arrived back at our hotel later that day we discovered that one of the hot stones has burnt His back. It has blistered and left quite a significant burn mark. We would have loved to have given the spa a 5/5, but the burn shouldnt have happened and has left a sour taste in our mouths. So get a pedicure, but maybe skip the hot stone massage.

Great foot therapy/massage. After putting dozens of miles on our feet wandering Hanoi, we stopped in here for an 80 minute foot therapy session. It was my first foot massage, and the staff was really attentive and helpful. Great service and a great price for a 80' service!
