Excellent. I had a great time at Midori Spa. The staff was really friendly and the massage was skillful. The place is simple, clean and cute. The value for money is excellent.

Amazing Massages. I visited the Midori Spa twice during my stay in Hanoi...it was just worth it! I had two Vietnamese massages, and both of the massage therapists were incredible. The staff is very friendly, and even offered my tea and fresh mango after my massage. Midori Spa offers exceptional prices. I came out (both times) feeling very relaxed. I have gotten massages done in the past, but these were definitely the best ones that I have had!

High quality massage in hannoi. After three days in hannoi we needed a break ans a massage. We found midori spa by chance and really liked the idea that it is run by a charity and thr proceeds go to the visually impaired. The entire massage is done by blind massage staff and they do a wonderful job. Come and unwind here for an hour or so. The space is clean, peaceful and comfortable.

Ẽtremely good masage and friendly staff. The blind masage staff blew me away despite their díability, such a great masage. The able sighted staff were extremely friendly and offerred us bẻer and food àfterwards! Cant thank the staff enough for their kindness and the spa is in such a great location.

AMAZING SPA. The Midori spa is excellent. The massage staff are all blind. Unforgettable! The staff are some of the friendliest people I have met in Asia. You cannot leave Hanoi without visiting here, Best massage I have ever had.
Great service . I booked here because near my hotel. Two times for Thai massage was excellent. The team really look after you well and their English id good. I will come back here again.
Excellent Spa!. I have been to many spa's in Asia; but none was as good as this one. Superb massage! I walked away as if I was reborn! When I come back to hanoi, I definitely go there again!

Excellent massage, lovely place, good price . During my stay in Hanoi I got two massages here. My first was a Swedish massage with a girl who was very well trained, it was so relaxing and relieved a lot of tension. You have to get a lift up to the 3rd floor of the building and it is surprisingly clean and relaxing atmosphere. The staff are really friendly at reception and extremely professional. The second time I went back I got a Midori massage which was a mixture of types of massage that all worked so well together to relieve tension and relax. This time I got a male masseuse and he was again extremely well trained, very strong as I wanted a hard massage and he was able to find all my knots and massage them better. I have had a few massages through South East Asia and the two massages I had here top any others that I have had. The value is excellent, and you will come out feeling fantastic.Highly recommended!!

Great quality- clean, affordable, and skilled. Midori spa is located near Hoan Kiem Lake, 10 mins walking distance from the middle of the Old Quarter. I dropped by around 1pm in the afternoon on a Monday and was pleased to be greeted with a cup of cool water and a clean facility. They showed me a menu of services, with prices were consistent with those on their website. I chose the 60 min Swedish Massage for 240 baht (~$11 USD) and they led me to one of the back rooms. Wasn't crowded when I was there so I had a room to myself, which was great. They also gave me a lockbox for my phone and wallet so I didn't have to worry about security during the massage. The masseuse did an excellent job and was incredibly professional. I was so relaxed by the end of it! Afterwards, they let me sit in the lobby for a while using the free wifi- no rush to pay and leave, and they even gave me a cup of tea while I was hanging out. As a female traveling solo, I was very happy with how safe/ clean the facility felt- no funny business. Will definitely go back next time I am in Hanoi!

Professional and too cheap. After looking for some spa, I chosen this spa to massage. I was empress by the blind massager. The service was excellent too.I will come when i go back to Ha noi.Hightly recomended

Excellent experience. Excellent experience. This place trains blind people to massage for a living. Their massage skills are extremely good and attitude very professional. I assure you will be much better than any massage parlours in HaNoi. If you want to support local communities go here, Midori Spa!

Wonderful feeling!. Few day ago,i had a party overnight with my friends. The day after i was really really tired. i had hurt almost my body. i felt so terrible. i went out and saw Midori Spa. i had body massage. it's so amazing so great. After relaxing i had a different felling. it's so great. i felt so comfortable. i suggested for my friends. All of them said that they want to come back. The price is good also.
Amazing. This place was great - wonderfully relaxing atmosphere and excellent massage for a good price. My masseuse was really skilled and also very sweet.

Amazing!. I went here today for a couple of hours to help my skin which has heat rash.They were amazing! I had a green tea skin scrub, mud wrap and a 40 minute massage. They gave me a great price and the lady was so professional. Clean place with plenty of privacy and respect.

Great Massage by Blind. I come here 2 times when I stay near the Midori spa. Nice spa and the staff very friendly. Gread body Thai massage. All the services made by the Blind people.Hightly recomment.

So good to have a soothing aroma massage . Having a soothing massage after walking all day is soo good
Because it will relax your body
And you will fill better
After a gentle massage , you will be totally relaxed and your circulation.
I recommend it it's very good

Best massage in Hanoi!. We walked in off the street for a massage after 3 days on a motorbike trip and were absolutely blown away by how good the whole experience was. The place is professional, beautiful, welcoming and has such high quality staff. Our therapists Tuan and Thuy were absolutely amazing. We have had a number of massages here in Hanoi and this place is definitely the BEST. We will be back for more!

Best massage of my life!. I have visited this spa for three days running having massages, facials and foot spas. I have been so impressed by the level of service offered. I feel amazing. Absolutely wonderful and would highly recommend going.

So amazing we went back again!. This spa sets the standard for what you should get in service! We found on trip advisor and had amazing service that we went back the next day for another service! We will go back again for sure! The staff were outstanding and made our experience top notch! You get what you pay for here! I would highly recommend this spa over any other we have had in all of Asia!

Best Spa!. In Vietnam there are many places to get massages, from all I was this is the best. Very professional from the start, make you a fairly opportune questionnaire for massage, the place is quiet, clean and well suited. Finally Massage is WONDERFULL!!l! as well as people attending. We looked forward to return !! :)

Best foot treatment. I visited the spa for a foot treatment after getting two blisters while walking around Sapa. The therapist was extremely professional while treating my feet. I even got a gift bag with iodine and plasters to go. I wholeheartedly recommend this spa.

FINALLY!!!!!. Finally!! After 4 weeks of looking for a masseuse that understands when I ask for a very strong massage, they can follow through! I had a 60 minute foot massage and my wife had a 60 minute head and neck massage and both of us were more than satisfied. Some of the reviews talk about the price being a bit high but I will gladly pay a little bit more for a proper massage. The entire staff was friendly and helpful!!I get massages regularly back home in the US and now I will be comparing them to this expierience instead of the other way around.
Simply great massage. Just finished a 90 minute deep tissue massage. Good quality massage and relaxing place - you can find cheaper but quality here is excellent.

The best spa I have ever tried. I travelled with my friends in Vietnam 5 days, After Hlong bay tour, our tourguide King Peter brought us back Hanoi and introduced us us with very nice massage Thanks you very much Vietkingtravel, thanks King Peter, thanks Marguerite Sapa we will recommend your services to all our friends
Fab massage. Third visit to spa...exceeded all expectations..very friendly and professional staff, great deep body massage and foot massage. Will be back
Massage heaven. A great find within the Old Quarter. Wonderful massage, super customer service and all for a very reasonable price.
Very nice service!. Very nice service and amazing massage! Best one so far, as I was disappointed with other places this was a great choice

Massage return visit. A friend and I had a massage here and were so impressed we returned after our tour out to Halong bay. We found the staff very friendly and the atmosphere here was very peaceful and calm. We were given the option of the tripe of treatment we required. I would recommend this spa and would revisit when back in Vietnam.
Fantastic place. I would really recommend this spa. I went with two other friends and we were all very impressed with the quality of service, relaxing atmosphere and standard of massage.

A piece of heaven in Hanoi. After spending a grueling four day trip in Hanoi and Ha Long Bay, this place was the place I needed to rejuvenate. Their staff was very welcoming and gave an excellent massage... their attention to details and their care was what my body and mind needed.. excellent time here
Worth to visit. It's not expensive.Excellent service, great message and relaxing place.Definitely need to try their strawberries tea.I love it.

Amazing spa!. One of the best massages we have ever had! Great value for money for the service and treatments and the staff are so friendly. I had the Refresh package and my fiancé had a deep tissue massage. They allowed us to be in the same room together which was so nice. The girls doing the massage were friendly but incredibly strong - definitely got rid of a lot of tension from navigating Hanoi's streets! We would definitely come back.

Oasis away from the Hanoi hustle. I booked in for a body scrub and enjoyed every minute. Friendly professional service from everyone at the spa. Would come back again to try one of their treatment packages!

Best Spa!. The staff were so friendly from the moment we walked in we were offered hot tea and the ambiance was serine with running water and tranquil music. I can not recommend the sea salt scrub enough, my skin feels like silk!

good service. they provide good massages by professional meussers. all are well trained. it is better to go in the afternoon when there are less people. you will get a good massage after a long walk in hanoi.

Terrible. I had an awful experience with a leg wax. The waxer didn't know what she was doing, they knew I was in a rush but she left the room for 10 minutes. Eventually she brought someone else back to help. The women couldn't wax legs. My legs still have big patches of hair. It was disastrous. I wouldn't recommend any leg wax from this place.

Good Service and Excellent Therapist Staffs. Yesterday, I had the best 90' Thai massage in my life at this Spa. While the services including consultancy, atmosphere, therapist room are just good, my therapist lady provided the best Thai Massage I'v ever had. The price is a bit higher than others spa in the same area, but it is really worth the money.

One of the best massages I've ever had.. I stumbled on this place when roaming in the Old Quarter. Like most spas they offer happy hour prices during the day and bump up the prices in the evenings. Although I'm sure you can negotiate price down anyway. The service is friendly and professional. I tried the aroma massage for $18usd. As the room was being prepared, I was sat in the lounge and offered tea. All staff spoke fairly good english. They give you a form before the massage to tick how soft/hard, and the scent you want but i think this is irrelevant. Overall the massage was very good and relaxing. You can find massages cheaper but the whole package was worth the 18 bucks.

Fabulous spa experience! Highly recommended.. Fantastic spa. We had a wonderful experience which was very relaxing. We enjoyed the relaxing spa package featuring body scrub, steam bath and soothing aroma massage. Great value for money too.
GREAT SERVICE!. Very great service at a reasonable price! I highly recommend this to people, especially after a long day of touring Hanoi!!
Spa experience at Marguerite. Wonderful experience. Friendly service. Great prices. Very good massage. Liked that you fill in a form, so that spa can meet exactly to your expectations.
Massage and scrub . Great massage in a great environment. We also got a scrub which left us feeling very smooth and relaxed. Highly recommend.
Great massage . Had a salt scrub and full body hour massage. Nice experience. Really nice therapists that had laughs with.

Pure cuddle!. One of the nicest things I did in Hanoi was visiting Margurite Spa. The Hanoi Garden Hotel (and many others in Old Quarter) have a cooperation with the Spa and they offer to pay for the taxa one way from the hotel. Very convenient! The receptionist was friendly and offered good advice and there was a lot of treatments to choose from. Being a novice in this Spa area I felt in good hands. The therapist was very polite and even though her English was limited there were no problems with the communication. I had the Spa Package “Relaxing” with warm body scrub, steam bath and soothing aroma massage preparing myself for a 15-hour flight, and it was worth every dong. The treatment took almost 2 hours and I felt as a new person. Afterwards I was offered tea and fruit making the visit and atmosphere even more cosy. The entire experience was delightful and I was very pleased. Will absolutely recommend this for everybody that wants some outstanding cuddle for themselves.

A little disappointing . The place itself was lovely. It had a nice room to change your clothes in with a shower and a closet for your clothes. They gave you shorts to wear. The room was quiet with nice music. The massage tables comfortable. The massage Itself was only fair. I had an aroma relaxing massage and she massaged without oil for most of the time. When she massaged my feet she just sort of did my heel without oil for a long time and then used oil for 2 minutes. She did my upper arms and completely ignored my hand. She did a pretty good job on my back. When she removed the oil she forgot my feet. Now I must mention that my husband was with me and he had a super good massage, also my sister was with us and she was very happy. So maybe this is just luck of who you get or maybe my girl was having a bad day.

Spa Package. The place is very calm and relaxing, the masseuse was amazing, very good and knowledgable.
The treatment was amazing although the room felt a bit small and cramped.
Overall I'd still say this was an amazing package.

Best massage in Vietnam!. We had a very excellent experience here - walked in from the street with no appointment and found the whole place just delightful. Our therapists were very skillful and the experience was wonderful. We will definitely be coming back in this trip. It was clean, relaxing, and very helpful to be able to shower on-site before and after. We were very pleased.

Full body massage. Best massage I've had in Vietnam (and I've had quite a few now). Professional, thorough, very well trained, friendly, and reasonably priced. In a very tourist friendly area too - 100% recommended!

Top of it's game. . We had massages at a few places in Hanoi and this one stands out in all areas. There is an air of professionalism from the outset with reception sitting you down with a cup of warm tea. The decor is lovely and clean. We had a few massages here and they were fabulous. The therapists are attentive and take their job seriously whereas at other places we felt the masseuses were just going through the emotions. If you want to be sure of getting a beautiful experience then look no further than here.

Best Massage of My Life!!!. I have nothing but praise for this place. I was sore and cranky from travel. I didn't know which massage to choose- they recommended the hot stone massage. I was a bit skeptical of this because you always see those pictures of the stones placed up and a person's back, and, what good does that do? This was not that: This amazing little masseuse used very hot, smooth stones and rolled them up and my back, in all the right ways and places. I couldn't believe how amazing it felt. Got all the sore out and felt so relaxed and refreshed after. It was an hour long massage - the best of my life- and it only cost about $20!! Extraordinary!!

The best massage I have ever experienced so far. My therapist was very professional but made me so comfortable. This spot is highly recommended due to therapists' amazing skill, nice staff. The atmosphere was also good. The facility was not unique just common and this is the only drawback I have ever found here. Very worth a visit in Hanoi.

Amazing massage! . This was one of the best massages I have ever had! It was very relaxing and enjoyable. I got the deep tissue massage which was 490,000 VMD. The staff were lovely and I felt relaxed as soon as I went in. Highly recommend!
Good and relaxing. Nice and soothing ambience, good massages- we tried Thai massage and aroma massage. Easy to locate in old quarters
Body massage. Very professional, relaxing body massage with plenty of options and insight on the best massage for you. If travelling with a friend you can also have the massage together.

The BEST foot massage !!. My friend and I wandered in , with throbbing feet from the heat and immediately felt the calm ,cool,serene atmosphere.We were seated in a lovely dark Air conditioned room and both had a 60 minute foot massage.It was lovely, firm and professional.Wish we had more time to come back and have a full body massage.

Nice spa in old town Hanoi. It was round the corner from my hotel on foot and great location if you're in the old part of the city. Nice ambience and service, although there was a kid, child of one the employees, screaming a little when I was there and generally the store room is next to the foot spa area, so there was some moving of things in and out. I did the foot spa and it was nice and relaxing. Price card in the photos attached here.
Good attention and massage . This is a good place to disconnect from the chaos and noise of Hanoi. 100% relax. We will come in the future.:)

Amazing massage, great customer service!. I had a brilliant back and shoulder massage here. The lady who was doing my massage was excellent and they were also super accommodating allowing my tired friend to have a lie down while I was inside. Also super relaxing, clean and classy environment.
IN HEAVEN!. Enjoyed the "relaxing" package including Steam Bath and Soothing Aroma body massage with 5 other friends and we all had an amazing time!

Soooo nice . Easy to reserve, nice staff and amazing atmosphere. Massages are even more incredible! We did enjoyed it a lot they where listening to what we wanted ( they can speak English ) I definitely recommend !
The most relaxing experience <3. The service as much as the place is amazing. The massage was really professional and relaxing. I warmly recommand this place !
Tuan. Very good technic of therapist. Warmly welcome from reception. Love the fragrance and atmosphere of ground floor area..

Amazing Vietnamese massage. From the moment we walked in, we were warmly greeted with a cup of tea and seated in the relaxing waiting room. The facilities were extremely clean and modern and we were able to shower before our massage. The massage was amazing. The therapists asked us throughout the massage if we were ok and were sensitive to our requests. We want to come back before we leave and highly recommend you give this place a try!

Lovely Spa Treatments. It was our last day in Hanoi and we wanted to take advantage of the inexpensive spas there. We just happened to stop into Marguerite Spa. I got a manicure with polish and an eyebrow wax and my boyfriend got a massage. It smells wonderful inside and the lady that greeted us was extremely nice. I have never had a manicure where the manicurist paid so much attention to my nails! It took almost an hour! They didn't have a huge selection of colors, but I'm just used to having lots of choices in the nail salons in the States. The eyebrow wax was great and not painful. She didn't use the wax with the strip that I'm used to and I preferred the one I received at Marguerite. When we were paying, they gave us each a gift bag with Vietnamese coffee and snacks. What a nice treat!

Super spa experience for my 3 sons (9/10/12) and me!. We had a lovely experience in the spa. My sons and me all went for a back, neck, shoulder and head massage (60 min) and we all enjoyed it. My therapist (a man) was super he found the weak spot in my neck and managed to release the tension. This spa is really worth a visit. If you have kids they have a big family room so they can enjoy their own massage in your vicinity! The prices are very democratic!

Relaxing Spa, soothing atmosphere. Had a couples massage here and it was a very relaxing experience.From the moment my girlfriend and I walked in, the atmosphere was very calming. We came here late on a Friday night after our visit with the night marker and it was a great way to unwind and come down from a busy day.We were greeted with great hospitality and some refreshing tea.Massages were definitely relaxing. I had my back cracked in ways I didn't know were possible too! But, it felt great. We had 60 minute massages for a good price.Glad we chose this Spa!Cheers,J & T
Amazing massage. I had a Vietnamese 90 minute massage.it was amazing. The room was nice and cool, clean and relaxing. Would recommende this place to anyone.

Good massage and clean pleasant surroundings in this small spa. Massage was good (opted for the Vietnamese massage). Staff welcoming and attentive. Spa very clean and showed / changing area was good. Only negative was when the ambience was broken when a noisy party of other guests left the spa. Our massage in Hoi An was a better experience and better value for money overall.

Will go back again and again!. Besides offering one free ride either there or to your hotel, they are super generous (the Vietnamese way), professional and highly skilled. Prices cant be beat for what they offer. Going back for a third time in a week for the full package. Love the staff!!
Tissue massage. Was very professional. People are very friendly, perfect atmosphere here. Did a tissue vietnam massage for 75 min. Like
Massage was perfect. I did a very good and relaxing deep tissue massage in the marguerite spa. It was awesome what i got for the price of the massage.

Professional Spa. Professional, welcoming, and friendly staff. Quiet and clean rooms. Receptionist are helpful and speak english very well so they understand what you want. Highly recommended. I tried Aromatic massage.

Soothing reprieve from the chaos. I happened across this spa after getting a bit lost in the old quarter, it getting dark, and me being tired and very hot. It was a WELCOME reprieve from that! It is a very cool, soothing space with nice running water, relaxing music and literally soundproof in the room. I wish I could just stay here!I had the deep tissue "traditional Vietnamese massage" for 1 hour for about $18USD at happy hour. It's hard to find cheap massage places here in Hanoi, different from Saigon, so while a bit $$ maybe in Asia, it was much cheaper than the US and very good. The therapist had nice pressure but I wouldnt call it deep tissue like I would be familiar with in the US. Regardless, it was very nice and I would recommend it to others for a relaxing and rejuvenating escape from the busy streets of Hanoi.

Amazing Deep Skin Massage. I have us massages in Thailand and in Vietnam and this one has definitely been in my top massages ever. It is more expensive than other massages but to me it is totally worth it.
Excellent spa. Went here on the recommendation of my hostel and it did not disappoint. Friendly service, very clean and professional. Spa menu has many choices and the price is great.
So good. Love Marguerite .! great service , friendly staff harmony , I experience the beautiful and pleasant space and massage my back stabbing me body so good
Excellent. The receptionist is very friendy and the therapists are all very skillful. You must try their deep tissue massage. Truly recommended.

Wonderful spa service. Lovely staff and very welcoming. From the moment we walked in it was very calming and we felt very comfortable.
My partner and myself both had the deep tissue massage and felt so relaxed after the treatment.
I would highly recommend this spa and hope to be back again soon

Mrs Donna . Lovely reception, clean and cool. Deep tissue massage was ok if you like the up and down up and down type. The technique could be improved dramatically! Not keen on fingernails being stabbed into my back. Expensive for what you get!

Relaaaxing!!!. We just come back from Marguerite Spa and feel great!
The welcoming was very hearty. Our therapists for the vietnamese massage were awesome! We had such a relaxing time! We recommend going to this wonderful Spa. The whole atmosphere is really nice!

Head and back massage. Excellent head and back massage. Really enjoyed it. The staff were very friendly and professional. I would recommend it to everyone. I will definitely be coming back before my trip is over.

Massage. My experience in marguerite spa was wonderful. I really enjoyed my back and neck massage. The service was excellent and staff were so friendly. I will definitely be back before my trip ends in Hanoi!

Marguerite Spa. Had an amazing experience in Marguerite Spa today. I got the back and neck massage and my therapist was very attentive and experienced. We got tea and nibbles on arrive and again before leaving. We also received a little gift, I will definately be returning before I leave Hanoi.

Amazing service. I have been here in the hot day at Hanoi.Out side very hot but when I came insite the first empression was very beautiful design and the faint aroma of attar made me feel much better! Then I chose Thai massage, it good the staff friendly and enthusiasm.
Will recomment for friend and my customers.

Amazing. Looking for a slice of heaven in the heart of Hanoi? You must come here their hands are magic!
One of the highlights of my trip.

Very relaxing spa. Great massage, very nice people. Also good advice, they listen very well. Even got a gift from them. I recommend this!
They oftenly aks you if they are doing ok during the massage, That's very nice too.

Two massages in three days. My friend and I went to Marguerite Spa for a massage and were very pleasantly surprised, so much so that we went back again a few days later and took our partners with us. The staff were very friendly and professional. Not having had many massages before, they were great at advising me what to get and gave us all a short questionnaire first to make sure we received exactly what we wanted. I also very much appreciated the transparent pricing – what you see is what you pay, which was a refreshing change from some of our other experiences in Hanoi. My partner and I got on a long haul flight shortly afterwards and the massage definitely helped to make the flight more comfortable. I would absolutely recommend this place!

Full Body Massagen. We visited the Spa twice and got full-body Massages. The staff is extremly friendly, they even remembered us and we recieved a really nice gift. We can highly reccomend this Spa in Hanoi and would always go there again. The price you pay is worth every Dong.

A relaxing oasis . My boyfriend and I both had a deep tissue massage here after a two week holiday. We had the massage on our last day and only wish we'd visited this spa earlier in the holiday! I was suffering from back pain after carrying my backpack but by the end of my massage it was completely gone. Everything about the experience was relaxing, entered the spa and had a cool tea in the reception area which is very beautiful and were shown upstairs to the therapy room which are also lovely, great facilities and a lovely shower room to wash off in afterwards. Only tiny annoyance was the therapists phone went off a few times but they had a little feedback form afterwards and I'm sure it will be easily fixed. They also had a form to fill before your treatment to highlight areas to focus on and areas to avoid if you have injuries. Excellent experience, would recommend to all.

Excellent Massage. An excellent massage in a relaxing environment. Therapists gave us a questionnaire before hand to determine areas to work on and areas to avoid- due to this had a excellent and relaxing massage! Will definitely be back!

Adorable people and amazing massage. Me and my 2 friends came here for a deep tissue massage (backpackers, we needed it!) and the whole experience was lovely. Kind and attentive reception, great massage and lovely cozy environment. Highly recommended!
amazing :). we came here twice in one day it was so good ! such nice staff and a really relaxing atmosphere. 10/10 would highly recommend !!

Lovely experience. I visited this spa with a group of friends on out last night in Vietnam ! It was just what we needed after four weeks of travelling .I got a lovely back neck and shoulder massage ! The staff were lovely and even gave us lemongrass tea as we waited ! I would recommend a visit to this spa if you wish to escape from the busy streets .
Excellent Spa in Hanoi. Truly recommended. Clean, nice , excellent massage and really kind employees, very relaxing atmosphere. I love it a lot!

"Hot Stone Bliss". Wow Wow Wow Visited this Spa on the recommendation of the Hanoi Pearl Hotel where we stayed at .......... the Spa provided complimentary taxi pick up. My son and I had the extra long Hot Stone Massage and WOW it was wonderful, absolute bliss and wish we'd had time to go back for more treatments. My husband had the 1 hour Aroma massage and he too said it was fabulous.Such a great wee place and well worth a visit !! We will be back next time we visit Hanoi xxx
Manicure. Fell in love with the staff who were gentle and caring since the moment I came in the door. I stayed in Hanoi for a week and a half and went to this spa twice. It was so worth it

Great deep tissue massage and facial. Did the 60 minute Swedish body couples massage. Reception is professional, spa is clean and staff are very helpful. Therapist was great and actually went very deep on areas I asked her to massage. Never had a facial before but tried with my girlfriend. Felt great and involved additional shoulder massage. Marguerite spa is awesome!
Massage, facial, eyebrows. Loved it. Very kind and accommodating staff. Highly recommend and great prices. Got Swedish Massage and facial, and they surprised me with a fancy hair braid!

dont like. nice interior, great location, attract spa menu on the street, where the minimum amount prescribed procedures, actually all expensive more than in 2 times. manicure and pedicure can not do, do not even waste your time and money, you will be disappointed, for manicure instruments are not sterilized,nail polish gel does not know how to remove.also its second my review and i will write more if owner will be protest it, course your SPA is complete mismatch of price and quality of services provided and tourists should be prepared for this.

Deel tissue. Just had an amazing deep tissue massage. Did not really knew what kind of massage I wanted when I walked in so they suggested the deep tissue therapy. It was exactly what I wanted, and not too expansive to. Would totally recommand it!

Deep tissue massage. Service was superb. Upon entering Marguerite spa, you will be served with a cup of daisy tea. Following which, you will be given a form to indicate body areas which you would like the therapist to focus on and areas to avoid. The latter i feel, is very meticulous of them as people with previous injury can enjoy their spa treatment fully without worrying about exacerbating their old injury. I had a wonderful session. The therapist was very skillful and friendly. She will check on me to find out whether everything is fine. Will definitely come back again. Price of the spa was reasonable and totally worth the money.

Deep tissue massage (90mins). The staff here are very nice and friendly. They welcomed us warmly with tea. It was nice of them to ask us to fill up a form which stated where we want our therapist to focus on and parts where we didn't want them to massage (eg. injuries). The massage was awesome! My therapist was very skilful and the strength she used was just right. Thank you for the good service provided! I would definitely come here again and recommmend this place to my loved ones!(:

Deep tissue massage. Had a relaxing massage and enjoyed free steam bath as our appointment was delayed for a while. Price is a little high but service is good. The manager also gave us each free gift of Vietnam drip coffee before we left!

90min deep tissue massage . The place was very comfortable and relaxing. I enjoyed the steam bath before the massage. The therapist was skilled and focused on areas that I wanted. The reception staff was very approachable and friendly as well! Thanks for enjoyable session
Go if you want a spa retreat. We booked the 2.45 hour relaxation spa for 2 and it was fantastic. The staff were amazing in ensuring we were satisfied. However on the pricey side!

Relaxing and accommodating . Had a refreshing spa package, 3hrs from hotel recommendation. Great reviews from TripAdvisor and did not disappoint. The staff were welcoming and very accommodating to your needs and wants. Would recommend to others and come back again. Thanks for great service Marguerite Spa.

Great massage experience. Stumbled upon this spa in the old quarter, their service exceeded our expectations, we had a great deep tissue massage that was very thorough yet relaxing. Staff at reception were very friendly and welcoming masseurs were very professional. Would recommend it.

Welcoming, friendly and cool relief on a hot day. We attended with our teenage daughter. We had been walking all day and were tired, our feet ached and we were hot and uncomfortable.The staff here were so friendly and welcoming. My daughter and I had an hour long foot massage, such bliss for our tired feet.Husbands neck was stiff from our flight, and his neck and back massage worked wonders.A cool welcome drink and fresh air conditioning made such a difference.If you are looking for time out from the busy streets of the old quarter, I would highly recommend this spa.It is just a short walk from la siesta hotel, so if you are staying there this would be perfect for you.

Excellent and amazing!!!. I and my husband stayed at Hanoi 3night and 4days and visited Marguerte spa 2 times. Actually if I stay at Hanoi more, i would like to visit here evryday!!! All staffs are very kind and warm.Spa is really clean and luxury.Of course Atmosphere is very good.I got a good relaxing

Excellent spa, with professional and friendly staff. I was blown away by the level of service provided by the staff at this spa. All are extremely friendly and welcoming, the manager is great and you are really made to feel welcome.They provide a free one-way taxi from your hotel to the spa. Upon entering you are greeted with a smile and provided with welcome drink whilst you select your choice of treatment from an extensive menu.We opted for the foot massage on our first day which was so great that we booked in for a spa package the following day! I would definitely recommend the body scrub with coffee and traditional Vietnamese deep tissue massage - both were excellent and the therapists catered to your needs for how much pressure they applied.There is a very peaceful atmosphere with great background music, running water and the perfect temperature (not too hot/cold).

Spa evening . Wonderful staff, great massages, and so kind! Everyone was warm and welcoming. They sent a taxi to our hotel to pick us up and paid the way, and offered a free steam room treatment upon arrival. They had clean rooms with beautiful music and the massages were excellent. Will definitely return again and again when visiting Hanoi.
Amazing!. The spa was fantastic, extremely friendly and accommodating staff, excellent massage, highly recommend! It's a great break from the hectic and heat of Hanoi.

Perfect. Conveniently located from our hotel, very friendly staff, received complimentary steam bath for a small wait, excellent deep tissue massage. All around a good and relaxing experience at a very nice location. Highly recommend it.
Wonderful!. Very wonderful and kind staff. Great service and massage. I had the aroma massage. It was very relaxing and just what i needed after a long bus ride. Highly recommend this spot!!
Fantastic spa visit. Wonderful premises, and the therapist was really good too. I had the Vietnamese deep tissue massage and would recommend the same for all weary travelers.

Good service and affordable. Very nice staff and good massage, will definitely come back ! 250VND for 30mins back massage.
Thanks for your hospitality
Enjoyed the experience. Amazing reception and environment that promoted the spa ambiance. Relaxing and peaceful music to accompany the massage.
Good spa with great treatment . The service is really nice. You will sense the welcoming since you walk into. The therapists are skillful and treat you with respect.

Great experience, excellent service. From the first step in the door, we received excellent and welcoming service. The staff are very nice and polite. The massage was great and worth the cost. I would recommend to all my friends

Amazing!!. I had lost my friends during shopping and walked into this spa and it was wonderful after I found my friends we had facials, pedicures and massages everything was amazing. The aroma is of lemon grass and ginger and the staff is super friendly. Marguerite Spa is a must.

Amazing Service and Incredible Massage!!!!. We were initially referred to the Marguerite Spa by the Blue Butterfly cooking class that we took. After wondering in, we were immediately greeted with really friendly staff who sat us down and offered us tea. The decor was incredible; beautiful ponds, lighthearted music, great lavender aroma and comfortable chairs, all but assuring us that we were sure to be treated very well. The owner that we met was more than willing to offer us a discount (of about 20%; not sure if he does this for everyone but we happily accepted). Prior to our massage, we were given a survey asking us to quickly fill out what we preferred in our body massage, further assisting this establishment in giving great service. We were kindly asked to take off our shoes, given comfortable slippers, and escorted to our private couples massage room where we had the chance to take a shower (both before and after our body massage), change into silk shorts, and lay down for an incredible couples massage. The masseuse (guy for me and woman for my fiancé) that we had were really great and knew exactly what they were doing. They were more than qualified and experienced in providing a truly great service, the kind that we couldn't have asked to be better. We came back two days in a row and if we had more time in Hanoi, would have returned yet again. In a city that offers massage spas on every street corner, the Marguerite Spa truly stood heads above the rest. It was very reasonably priced (after all, you get what you pay for) and for 850 VND (approximately $35), we were provided a great 75 minute body massage (Thai for me, and deep tissue for my fiancé). A truly amazing experience for anyone looking to relax and truly escape on their vacation!

Friendly helpful staff, clean and stylish rooms and great massage. Found this place by chance as I was looking for a decent foot massage in a need and pleasant place.Prices slightly higher than average, but absolutely managable and very much worth the money.I will be back!

Nice!. HiMy friends and i went to this soa uppn recommendation from hotel. I must say they have very good service. Their massage was good and the ladies were polite and accomodating to our requests. Namely Ha Oanh, Loan and Nguyet. Thank u ladies! :)

Relaxing massage. Our hotel recommended this spa and we were not disappointed. We were made to feel very welcome, my husband, daughter and I all had the deep massage in the same room. Very relaxing and we recommend this spa.

An oasis of luxury. Came here after hotel recommendation and loved it! We had a pedicure spa and manicure. The women were so lovely, especially Ha Oanh, who we had a great chat with in English. We felt very special and we would definitely come back here again.
Very nice and clean spa!. The spa was great...we got a package which include body scrub, massage, and facial. The deep tissue massage was more of a thai massage mixed with a relaxation/spa massage.

Amazing!!. I stumbled across this spa while walking around and I'm so glad that I did! Friendly staff and reception. Best massage so far in Asia. I got the 60 min deep tissue and it was INCREDIBLE! Highly recommend this place for a good massage in Vietnam.
Totally recommendable!. Very friendly stuff, Oanhn was very professional and helped me a lot with my back pains!. Very clean and good located, totally recommendable!
Great location and service! . The Vietnamese deep tissue massage was rejuvenating and very unique! Customized to your wishes and very professional.
Great Message. Overall really great massage! One of the better ones I've received. I did the deep tissue massage, and the lady was excellent. They are definitely a legitimate massage place.
Great massage!. The 75 min Vietnamese massage was excellent! Reception was very nice and the massages were top notch. Really professional, clean, and relaxing - would definitely recommend to anyone!

Awesome massage. We walked past the spa when we were in search of food. Place looked clean and nice and someone else walking out said it was a phenomenal massage. After walking past other spas that tried to get us to come in, we thought that the people who worked here were really nice and welcoming. Well, we weren't disappointed! My friend and I opted for the Vietnamese massage and got excellent service and pricing.A plus: the waiting room had wifi and a/c!

Amazing. I loved this place!!! Best massage so far and very legit and professional. The front desk takes time to understand your needs, it's also extremely clean and smells great.The massage was a deep tissue and done very well. I get a lot of massages in the states and this one stacked up. Will return soon.
Wooooooo. My first full body massage and it was awesome. The staff were so friendly, the environment was relaxing and the massage was excellent.
Excellent!. Staff was extremely friendly and our massages were great! We heard about Marguerite Spa from our hotel and they even provided us with a free cab back when we were done.
A great massage! . They rubbed places on me that I didn't even know needed rubbing. Such a great massage, wish I had more days in Hanoi so that I could come back. Would highly recommend to anyone!!

Relaxation central . Our hostel recommended this spa to us and it exceeded our expectations. For an EXTREMELY reasonable price we got a full body scrub, steam shower, and full body massage. It was fantastic and I would be coming back again if I could!

Great massage. Staff really made a big effort to make me feel very welcome. Went for the Vietnamese massage which was very good. Price is slightly more expensive than other places but still great value for money, you get a really good massage here.

Deep tissue massage. My therapist was awesome! Although she was very small in stature, her strength was amazing. She used her elbows, knees, and feet to really dig into all of my problem spots. While waiting for my wife afterwards, I had a long conversation with the owner. He was very considerate and interested in hearing about any suggestions for his spa. I would repeat.
Facial . Ms. Ha Oanh did the facial for me and she is great, very friendly and professional. I will comeback for a body massage tomorrow. Highly recommended.

Wonderful service. My friend and I came here for a massage and pedicure on the recommendation of our hotel and we were not disappointed!After a few bad experiences in Hanoi with overcharging and dodgy massages, I was sceptical but I was quickly won over by the quality of service and transparency of pricing at Marguerite Spa.The receptionist spoke lovely English and gave good recommendations about what services to book. The therapists were all very friendly and professional. All the rooms were really clean and I'll be coming back again for another massage before we leave.Highly recommend for anyone looking for some R&R in Hanoi's old quarter.

Clean and friendly . Very nice people who cared about your comfort and relaxation. I really appreciated the cleanliness of the location and of course the message was amazing -- really great job on the hands!!! :)

Really nice. Came here twice during my stay in Hanoi and really enjoyed the services I got. I had a 60 minute massage and a pedicure. Both were very relaxing and the spa rooms were nice and calming. The staff was also welcoming. I would recommend this place to others
Amazing. I absolutely loved the atmosphere here. The staff were super friendly and helpful. The massage (deep tissue) was incredibly relaxing. I would highly recommend.

Comfortable and clean . It is really clean and mood is good in the lobby.I enjoyed massage, I saw the owner is also kind to all customers.Every time I visit Hanoi, I drop by hete due to service, you had better get massage, I recommend it.Calvin Lim
Massage. We had an awesome experience here..maybe slightly more expensive but very much worth it.....very clean and friendly and an all round relaxing time...highly recommend everyone try here👍

Loved it!. Spa was recommended by the hotel and we were very happy they did. Enjoyed every bit of the treatment. We had the refreshing package and it was just what we needed. Staff very nice and friendly.

Excellent. We were introduced to this place by our hotel staff.
Slightly more expensive then normal but the spa paid for our cab fare (one way)
Very professional and clean. Had one of the best massages in ages.

Absolutely wonderful, above-and-beyond experience!. We booked a massage for all four of our family members because it was our daughter's 14th birthday. The massages were fantastic but the real memory is what happened afterward. The owner and his wife surprised our family with a beautiful birthday cake and a bottle of wine and the "Happy Birthday" song playing in the lobby! We gave a toast to our daughter and got to meet his daughter (Mimi) and had a wonderful connection overall. We can't recommend this spa highly enough as it represents a highlight of our three week trip to Asia. (And back to the massages... they were particularly accommodating because they put all four of us in a room together which made the shared experience even better. The therapists were terrific and we left feeling revitalized and refreshed.)
Best massage. We were recommended by our hotel. The spa took care of our cab fare one way which was great. We had the best massage ever...a bit pricey but well worth it.

good massage, but rather expensive. I had a 75 minutes full body massage here, and it cost about 550000VND. The ambience and service was fantastic. The massage itself was decent, and the masseuse was attentive, but she just lacked the strength and experience to hit all the right spots.
Timeout from busy Hanoi. Excellent service! Ladies were very friendly and professional. Our visit provided a much need break from the busy and hot streets of Hanoi

DERSERVING SPA TO ENJOY. Yesterday, I took 5 my guests to Hanoi Marguerite Sapa (68 Mã Mây str for a body massage). We all had more than 1 hour relaxing and lying comfortably on desk with staff touched on body. I often go to many spa in and around Hanoi but this Spa is special one I try. Spa is refined decoration, staff are very professional and kind hearted to serve us. If visting Hanoi Old Quarter, you should take a spa with this. Thanks alot !

Worst experience ever -full body massage. Dorm room style massage rooms seperated with see through curtains... which I asked on several occasions for the therapist to close!! and was ignored I could clearly see the people next to me, I even tried to close them myself.The rooms were cold with air-conditioning on full, and the therapist was constantly coughing and clearing her throat(not very relaxing), also the lights left on not creating the right ambience no background music music either .The massage itself was done with very little effort with a cold wet towel wipe down of the oils after (very strange, surly a hot towel would be more relaxing or even the oils left on the body ) this left me cold a no wet!!! 3 of us attended and we all felt it was a total waste of money!!Do not waste your money !!
Lovely ladies . We had a very long journey. We stopped by and it was just amazing. We did 30 min and it was just what we needed after long walks.

Back Massage. My friend and me we got a 60 min back massage. It was the best massage we ever had! You can choose the strength of massage in a questionaire before the massage. It was a bit more expensive than the Massage in Thailand but it Is definitely worth the money! The atmosphere is also very nice so that you can really relax. I can absolutely recommend this Spa!

Wonderful massage, wonderful service. Based on the owner's recommendation we both selected the deep tissue massage and we were not disappointed. The private room made for a relaxing, private experience and the staff was extremely friendly and professional. After our massages, my wife got a manicure and I got a pedicure. We were both also pleased with our experience. Thank you Marguerite for a wonderful experience. We truly appreciate your hospitality.

The best massage experience. Had the hot tea massage with an emphasis on acupressure. The spa was welcoming, relaxing and clean. The staff was nice and accommodating. The hot tea massage involved hot balls placed on different places, mostly along your back. 90 minutes flew by. Felt as though I was in a half-asleep, or like dreaming but awake. One of the best massages I've ever had. Incredibly reasonably priced. You have time beforehand to review options and what you'd like. Definitely recommend!

Ms Debbie Nunn. Wonderful environment very friendly and professional staff. We were greeted with a smile and made to feel very welcome. A very reasonable price to pay for such great service. Thank you to the girls at Margurerite Spa.
A lovely place for a relaxed day. Lovely staff here. A relaxed atmosphere with music, running water etc. Had one of the best foot massages ive had in asia and great manicure. Perfect end to our trip!

Nice spa! Recommended!. Nice environment, skillful staff and friendly host! The place is clean and well decorated. The staff is helpful and considerate The price is reasonable as well. It worths the money. :) I will come again if visitng hanoi next time.

So far the best spa I have tried in Hanoi. The environment is really nice with elegant interior and good service.I chose the Deep Tissue massage which is a 90-minute massage with aroma. The therapist's skill is excellent.

Marguerite oil & Hot stone massage. Good experience, excellent therapist friendly staff, nice and clean environment. Second day I try the food massage, very relax, hope can get more discount from here.
FOOT MASSAGES. I hv been visit for Marguerite Spa for 2 times, they provided very good services, staff was friendly, places was very clean and location convenient.

So good we went twice!. We went to this spa twice in a week, our experience was so good! I had the 90 min deep tissue massage and my wife had the 90 min herbal massage - she said it was the best massage she's ever had! You'll leave the spa feeling so relaxed, like you're walking on air. The staff are really friendly and the atmosphere is relaxing as soon as you walk in. You're given tea when you arrive and asked to fill in a form to note down any pains/sprains you have and which areas of your body you would like them to focus on. Would return again
Vietnamese Massage . Good experience, excelent therapist, friendly staff, nice and clean environment. The spa pay the taxi from/to your hotel.
Great place! . I am very satisfied with the service here! The staff are extremely warm and friendly. :) the place is well decorated and has a peaceful atmosphere! Highly recommend

Fantastic experience. My husband and I went there today and had a wonderful experience, I had a facial and my husband had a Swedish massage. The staff were very professional through out our 75 minutes of bliss. The therapists did not chat through out our treatments like others have commented so hopefully they have taken that on board.

Amazing spa. One of the best spa I have been! clean, friendly and amazing massage! Me n wife did foot massage the first day than we had swedish and stone massage. It was really awesome. Look for Mr.han , he is the owner and speak great English too. Uber is the way to go in Hanoi .

Lovely spa in the heart of the old quarter. We decided to splurge on a spa package from Marguerite on our last day in Hanoi. It was worth every penny. The spa is clean and peaceful, and the staff was very friendly. The highlight for me was a 60 minute deep tissue massage from "Su-Ann" my amazing masseuse. The best massage I've ever gotten. At the end, the staff even surprised us with traditional Vietnamese food, and the manager came over to check on us personally. Definitely a must-do for any trip to Hanoi. See you next time!
Very good in compare of money value. the message & cleanliness was good, but the music, aroma, & spa specialties weren't there. still, in compare to the money you are paying, it's really good.
Amazing experience!. Great welcome, courteous service, wonderful ambience, amazing spa experience and fantastic value for money!

Great experience. I had a wonderful experience at this spa. The staff were extremely friendly and the service I received was superb. I also received a gift after my treatment which was a genuinely thoughtful touch. It also stands out as a cleaner and better run establishment, so I would most definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a premium experience.

marguerite spa vietnam. Just finished a soothing aroma masage with marguerite spa.together with my husband who having his foot massage.Good reception services.spoken to the young handsome owner,Hin.the spa is about 8 months old and it has a good location.pricing reasonable. .. not the lowest but valued.Skill above averages. ...will try the facial care tomorrow and hopefully is awesome one before back to Singapore.

Just another massage spa. Like any massage spa in Hanoi, there are different strokes for different folks. My wife enjoyed the massage she received and rated it slightly above average. She said her masseuse (blond dyed hair) was intuitive to her pressure points. I on the other hand, rated mine below average: rough hands (almost like an exfoliation), fingernails (scratches the skin at times), hits the bones a lot of times, misses most pressure points and knots (even after being redirected many time).It was also a little disappointing that you are asked to fill in a questionnaire before the massage indicating which body parts to focus on/ avoid, and yet it doesn't seem like the masseuse read them before starting the massage. I guess all this was offset by the relatively cheaper price than in my home country. CONCLUSION: I will probably not come back before trying the other better reviewed spas. I would rather pay a slightly higher price for a better massage.

Just Wonderful and Highly Recommended. We stumbled into this Spa after making our rounds on foot which seemed like we had covered all of the old quarter and was in dire need of a massage. We were immediately drawn to how it stood out from the rest of the spas, looked clean and was decorated tastefully.The staff and the owner were incredibly welcoming and kind. Great command of english as was truly hospitable making sure we were treated like Queens. My friend and I chose the Foot Spa and did not want to leave it was that good. I returned on my own for the second time before I had to rush off to the airport and even then they accommodated my request if it meant getting a mani and pedi done under 1 hour. Highly recommended spa if you are into relaxing and stepping away from the noise and the busy streets of Hanoi into this peaceful sanctuary.
Massage Vietnam - best in S.E. Asia. Awesome massage at reasonable price. I'd go again tomorrow if I could... Friendly and professional and gave a discount from 'list price'

Great spa worth the visit!. This spa was fantastic. The owner and all women were very friendly and did an excellent job. We went back a few days in a row for massage, pedi, mani, and waxing. Very clean and very professional. Worth a visit.

Great Staff, good massage. . .. While having a late supper at a nearby restaurant, I inquired about the spa's offerings and which of those would be available in an hour or so. Two of us returned after dinner and they were able to accommodate both of us with the cautions and extra emphasis areas each of us requested. I returned solo on another day when many customers were discussing which treatment they would like from the large menu. I was fortunate. They were able to provide the selected massage immediately. While the menu of treatment offerings is well articulated about content, I didn't experience as big a difference in the massage technique as I'd expected. Nonetheless both massages were professional and the therapist on each occasion repeatedly asked if I was OK with the pressure. The whole staff worked together to please and accommodate. I was able to use my credit card which saves on the amount of foreign money needed to be exchanged for Vietnam Dong.

Great experience at Marguerite spa. Great value for money. New facility and they try very hard to meet your expectations. Not quite up to standards as a North America spa but close. I wasn't expecting that anyway. I would definitely recommend this spa.

Amazing massage and friendly service!. My partner and I both had the amazing package which was 4hrs 30 mins...however it did end up taking longer more like 5 hours. Could not fault the staff, they were lovely and very friendly. The package included herbal steam/sauna, body scrub, massage with hot stones/herbal balls, facial & foot spa/massage. It was actually amazing - the girls worked so hard and were very professional. At the end we enjoyed some local spring rolls and fresh fruit also included in the package - we even got given a gift as we left! Thanks to the girls and owner for a beautiful day :)

A professional service in the old quarter. Usually you will only get some gentle massage when opting for a cheap massage in the city center. This spa on the other hand is very professional and offers great value for money. Highly recomended!

bad bad and bad service. I chosed aroma massage for 60 minutes. after being the manager adviced. I'm really disappointed after the finish. staff constantly talking loud, no sense of relaxation, they try to ask for tip. I have allergies on people very uncomfortable for 2 days as massage oils. I will never return to this place and it's not like nice previous article.
Fantastic spa. Wonderful massages! The women looked after us incredibly well, we were offered a cool drink on arrival and were treated to excellent massages and pedicures.
Very good.. Good massage and clean facilities, an enjoyable experience. The staff were friendly. Shower facilities available. Recommended.
Massage. Loved this place, staff friendly and professional and my massage was amazing. Went back twice in two days :-)

Easy friendly smiles . Masseuse were very friendly not overly enthusiastic that makes you feel completely relax . Easy smiles and great skills. The staff went out all the way to pick up customer from hotel !

terrible therapist. i went here after checked good reviews through TripAdvisor. but I am really disappointed in this place, im just chossed thai massage in 90 minute. the staff always on the phone and talk full time after that they ask tip $ 5 for one person. how can for tip????

Excellent standards. On par with aus.. We had a herbal stream spa which is basically a herbal sauna. Excellent and calming.Also had a herbal massage and a hot stone massage. This was excellent. The therapists were attentive and calm. The talking was in whispers and set at a tone to keep a nice ambience. We had our own private room with no extra clients. I had an accident previously and the therapist was very attentive to ensure that the sore and swollen bruises and grazes were not worsened. Absolutely wonderful service and would recommend easily!
Honest good servicd. Enjoyable massage Clean premises Great service focus. Will come back if in Hanoi. Recommended for visit

Great prices, atmosphere, experience, and best of all are the staff.. I went to the Marguerite Spa as I'd been hiking and had sore legs. I'd chosen the place because of their professional looking catalogue, decent prices, and the 10% discount I was offered by a handout I'd received. I am so relieved that this is the place I went to. Right from the moment I walked in I was greeted by professional staff (who also paid for my cab to the Spa), had time to relax in comfy leather chairs with a cup of tea before being escorted off to a toom for my Foot Scrub, Spa and Mask (75 min- followed by my manicure and pedicure). Big comfy suede feel chairs with big pillows greeted me in the next rooms, and I had a mud soak for my feet followed by a great exfoliation. My massage was perfect, and the guy focused on all the areas I asked him to. The mask was a delightful way to end that portion, and I honestly almost drifted off to sleep I was so content. 3Following that the most lovely girl gave me a FANTASTIC pedicure. She also had me in laughing with her great stories, and I loved every moment of talking to her. I had two broken toes and she managed to still paint them without causing me any pain at all. I am so thrilled with the job she did. Then my manicure which took a bit of work as I had chipped nailpoish from weeks ago, and damaged nails from my trip to Halong Bay. A different attendant did my manicure and was efficient and polite throughout the experience. I then managed to undo part of her work by forgetting my nails were wet and scratching my head, and she didn't get upset or annoyed, and fixed them for me at no extra charge and with no worries. They happily let me sit comfortably and relax as my nails dried and didn't rush me out the door either, which is what I always seem to get back in Australia! They also have a great Wifi connnection they are happy for you to use, and are quite central. If I was in Hanoi longer I'd happily head back. There was a couple there while I finished my manicure and it was their third visit, which speaks for itself! I'd recommend them for sure!

Worth to try!. The environment is very comfortable, all facilities is clean.Staff is very friendly. We experience professional massage from massage therapist and good services from the staff at reception~
Excellent. That was a great placeSuch a excellent service and warm welcome Worth for money Oil massage was great

Upscale yet affordable spa experience among its peers and neighbors in Ma May Street. Massage experience itself is good.. My family and I (the four of us) were choosing which spa to go to in the Old Quarter/ Hoan Kiem district. Specifically, we stayed at the Oriental Central Hotel along Hang Bac Street.Upon the advise of Trip Advisor of the nearby spas (including the hotel's in-house spa), we canvassed the spas along Ma May Street, which is literally just a stone's throw away from the hotel. We window shopped the spa rates of 3 different stores and ended up choosing Hanoi Marguerite Spa.Pros:1. Among the upscale spas in Ma May Street, Hanoi Marguerite Spa is more affordable. We were specifically looking to either have a traditional massage or a hot stone massage.2. They offer a wide range of spa services, from massage to facial to nail polish to body treatments, with different time durations. Just check their menu of services.3. It is strategically located which makes it very accessible to tourists. It is located at Ma May street and a corner. You can't miss the signage. 4. The front desk personnel and the whole staff are friendly and smiling. They can communicate in English relatively well which makes the whole experience more pleasant.5. The spa facility is clean and upkeep is great. The place even smells fragrant and relaxing with some herbal oil.6. Most importantly, the masseuse and the massage experience was good. The masseuse knows what she is doing and adjusts the massage pressure according to your preference. The hot stone massage was a very relaxing and sleep-inducing experience. Nothing negative to really point out.7. They are open until 11:30PM. They also accept reservations.8. We were offered a token after our massage. We were handed a small pack of ground coffee and coffee drip filter.Cons:1. You have to make a down payment if you make a reservation. This of course prevents a client no-show.2. The spa rooms and beds are located at the 2nd floor up to the 4th floor. This could be a minor issue for people who are already tired of climbing up stairs after a long day of walking. The steps are quite steep too.Would I recommend this place to others? Definitely yes.Would I go back?Definitely yes.
Hanoi marguerite spa. we were greeted with a friendly smile! Massage was very professional! Was a wonderful experience while visiting Old Town Hanoi!

Professional, relax and soothing ambience. Came here on March 12, and been in hanoi for four days and decide to reward myself with a massage before catching a plane. Originally wanted to walk for 20minutes to a spa location and happen to walk past this spa which look pretty decent and professional. Staff welcome me in to the spa and it looks clean and professional. Find the price value for money and decide to try for an hour. Decent relax massage. As I have nose block, the staff is quick to pass to me tissue paper for my nose. The location is convenient and near my hotel. Had a good experience trying the spa here. Hope you enjoy too.

Soothing ambience, Good value for money. Only had time to come after dinner so a full body massage was not an option (sigh!). Opted for a 1 hour foot massage and was very satisfied with the overall experience and service. They put the 2 of us in a private room where we could lay down while the masseurs tended to our lower limbs. It was totally relaxing. Towards the end of the hour, we also got massages on our arms, backs and heads. Wow - what a refreshing experience. My only regret was not having enough time to go back; a mistake I wont make again.

Proffesional, clean and relaxing. The four of us together in four beds in the same room. We startet and ended at the same time.The massage tok 75 minutes. One of us was a fysioteapist, and ment this was professional. The mest massage we had in Vietnam.

Fantastically convienient and Excellent Service stuff. I'm very impress with the reception I got from all the staff of the hotel. They were extremely helpful from day 1 to last day. Will definitely stay there for sure!

Good facial service . I did the brightening facial. The girl was good. My request was for thorough extraction, she quickly asked the door boy to translate as she didn't understand English. She did a thorough good job. I'm happy.

Perfect after a long day of roaming the streets.. My hotel recommended this spa. The first time i went i didn't book an appointment. I was exhausted from walking all day and came across this spa. There was already a discount for that day and they gave me an additional discount plus a 15% discount for my next time. So if you in Hanoi and enjoy massages then do go here. Its professional and clean and i think the price is cheap. There are cheaper places yes but i do have standards which they met and was still under $20. Thank you for the wonderful massages!

Good massage, proffesional service, variety but prices hight for Vietnam. We had two different massages from the broad variety they have to offer. The service is very good and the staff professional. Prices are cheap compared to Europe but high for Vietnam.

Great value for money. I had a head, neck and shoulder massage while I was in Hanoi and the Marguerite Spa were very good. The location is great. The rooms are clean and tidy, and the staff area attentive. Great value too.

Great service!. We went to Marguerite Spa as we walked past and it looked nice and affordable. The service was great. We took a 75min massage and steam bath, and feeled great after that!I don't have any experience with Spa's in general, but I believe the service if really good for a good price.The staff was kind and we even received a present at the end :-)Great spot if you're looking for some relaxing time after a few days of trecking and traveling around the country.
Wonderful service. We were visiting Hanoi and went to the spa for a manicure. Great service and staff were very friendly.

Pretty average. We got a shoulder and neck, and a foot massage. Shoulder and back massage started on the feet and didn't really concentrate on the shoulders and back. Foot massage was mostly the legs. Felt it could have been a lot better.

Terrific. Just had our first massage in Vietnam and Marguerite Spa was fantastic. Relaxing, enjoyable and soothing we enjoyed every minute. They provided us with tea before and after our spa and even presented us with a gift to take home. We will definitely return.

Expected more.... With all the reviews, we expected more. Staff was very friendly however the amenities were not up to par. One cramped toilet for all guests and decent but not very clean massage rooms. Therapists did not wash hands before the massage and were talking while in session. The massage though not the best, relieved our tired bodies from a days walk around the city. Thank you to the staff however for making a great effort.
Massage . Just been to bali,bangkok,and phuket and had numerous massages . coming to vietnam i was not sure how good massages would be here but this place overall was the best of all. Amazing.

New spa, good value, excellent massage. We visited Hanoi Marguerite Spa because it was highly rated on TripAdvisor, moderately priced and close to our hotel – and we are extremely glad that we did!They offered a very fair price for an hour-long aromatherapy massage, and were happy to show us their rooms and aromatherapy oils prior to us deciding to pay for anything. There are multiple rooms with 4 beds and some with 2 (potentially also a single room, but we didn’t see). Each room has a bathroom with shower, and lockable cupboards to store valuables. Their facilities are very clean, new and modern. They also had an endless supply of sweets!Our masseuses were confident and provided excellent massages. They were very professional throughout, and ensured that we received the full hour massage.Hanoi Marguerite offers excellent value for money; we also visited a cheaper place for a quick mani-pedi and could really notice the difference in quality of interior design, chairs and (from our observations of others) massages.

Amazing Massage. I was a bit apprehensive about visiting some of the spas in Hanoi but upon entering this spa my concerns were put to rest. The staff was extremely warm and welcoming and the spa was very clean. I went for a 60 minute Thai massage and it was just what I needed. The staff were professional and had a good knowledge of the stress points on the body. The massage was far superior to anything I received at home. It was a nice escape from all the loud hustle and bustle from outside. I enjoyed my massage so much that I returned the next day for a 75 minute massage. At the end of this massage the staff gave me a small gift as a token of their appreciation. I would highly recommend this spa to others.

Great Spa treatments and Amazing Staff. I've been to quite a few legitimate spas in the region, and specifically in Vietnam. This is by far one of the best spas I've been to for a variety of reasons, including the incredible value you get (price you pay vs. spa treatment). The Spa treatments are very good. The owners of the spa did a very good job selecting and training their personnel. They go above and beyond with ensuring that you are taken care of and hopefully become a repeat customer. The massages, facials, ambiance, and even complimentary tea/snacks are first class. Definitely go here and be sure to ask for Cyndia - she's phenomenal and will take great care of you!

Deep Tissue Massage. Did the 90 minute deep tissue and it was exactly what I was looking for. The service here is excellent and the property is also very well maintained and clean. Easily among the top spas in Hanoi!

Fantastic massage. I was recommended to the Marguerite Spa by my hotel and it proved to be an excellent choice. I was thinking of a 60 minute Thai massage, but the Manager recommended I take the 90 minute one instead so that I would be more relaxed. Another excellent choice. Ms. Thuong's massage was the best I have ever had, so good in fact I came back for another 90 minute massage the very next day! All the Staff were very welcoming and friendly. Very highly recommended.
Only OK. I picked this place based on good reviews and had a massage that was ok but not great. I came away with main memory that the room was too cold.

Good experience. I stumbled across this place on way back to my hotel. I had been walking all over hanoi and decided i really wanted a foot massage. I went for a clay mask, scrub and foot massage. First impressions were good apart from my feet were basically washed in a yellow bucket. Aside from that the service was fantastic, relaxing and soothing. While the clay mask was on my feet the girl proceeded to give me a wee neck and shoulder massage! Unexpected but welcomed....i also checked they didnt charge me.... it was just a friendly extra! How nice!! :) Highly recommend!

A tranquil retreat in the heart of the hustle and bustle of hanoi. Came here for a massage to escape the brilliant madness of the old quarter. We were hot and sweaty and so very pleasantly surprised to be greeted with a glass of iced water, cooling air con, soothing music and trickling water. The back massage was deep and I found it divine, though my friend left with a small crick in her neck (which did soon wear off). The staff seem willing to respond to your massage preferences too. Would like to try this place for a manicure as the staff seem very competent and friendly in what they do. A serene experience and great value for money!
great thai massage. great massage, nice people, nice ambient. so everthing you need. now i have to write 100 letters - so i write more words...

Lovely staff. We had a lovely massage but as seems to be with a lot of massage places the staff continually talk which is very annoying when you're trying to relax.They gave us a gift of coffee when we were leaving which was very lovely.

A Great Spa in the Old Quarter. There is no shortage of spas in the old quarter but Hanoi Marguerite stands out due to its excellent treatments, friendly staff, and clean facility. I visited twice during my recent trip to Hanoi and enjoyed both treatments. The first time I got a 60 minute foot massage that was pure bliss and turned out to be more of foot, leg, lower body massage. The second time I chose an aromatherapy massage that was just what I needed before getting in a 14 hour flight home. The pressure for both massages was excellent (I chose medium) and the staff checked in to make sure I was doing okay throughout the treatments. This spa is the perfect place to escape the chaos of the old quarter for a few hours!

"Absolute bliss". I went to Marguerite Spa after reading Trip Advisor and also after declining the recommendation of my hotel to go elsewhere. I was not disappointed. I had been travelling for 6 weeks with many plane trips and walking what seemed like 100's of kms. My back and feet were very sore. Having had a hot stone massage 3 days before at another establishment which was lovely but not enough for my aching muscles. I chose to have a 90 min deep tissue and 45 min foot massage. I had originally booked 60 mins but as my deep tissue massage went overtime and my feet were worked on my feet during the body massage. I shortened it due to time restraints. This was not a problem for them. I had Chuong, a male masseur. I was a bit hesitant at first but his strong hands were exactly what I needed to get deep into the soreness. I was given a set of satin boxers to wear so felt sufficiently modest. I have had a lot of massages and I would say they would have to have been the best I've ever had. My soreness was gone instantly. The spa itself is only a month old and very clean. I would highly recommend it and will return when I come back to Hanoi.

Firm foot/leg massage. Service was very good, although they had to hunt for their masseuse ! The foot massage area was well decorated with good ambiance music. The massage was very firm, sometimes a little too firm. The guys on the front desk were very sweet and gave us a gift of Vietnamese coffee. Great English spoken by these guys. Good value for money too.

A pure relaxation atmosphere combined with sexuality and excitement.. Hanoi Marguerite Spa is the best spa in Hanoi. A sensual massage having a pure relaxation atmosphere combined with sexuality and excitement. Amazing experience I have ever had. I highly recommend other people also to experience this heavenly feeling.

Best Spa in Vietnam. . One of the best Spas in Vietnam. The two therapists Xuyen and Huyen are very qualified and did excellent deep tissue massages. Me and my wife enjoyed the massages a lot and we were coming back every day for about a week. Keep up the good job.

Great Oil Massage!. Had a great oil massage there tonight. I haven't had too many good experiences with massages in Vietnam, but this one proved worth the time and money. Really relaxing and she used a lot of pressure like I had asked. Everyone here was also really nice and it was really clean. I just wish I had asked for the woman's name that massaged me since I'll be going back in 3 days when I'm back from Ha Long Bay!

Bliss in the heart of the Old Quarter. I should start this review by saying I'm a girl who gets regular massages - here in Australia I have one every week and when I travel I try and get them as much as possible.
